This came after a teaser at the ending of episode #9 of Bleach: Thousand-Year Blood War, and fans were beyond excited as the series had been radio silent since 2020.

item.title: Bleach s New Anime Confirms It s Different From The Manga In a Good Way
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARYThe new Bleach anime, Thousand-Year Blood War, is not afraid to deviate from the manga’s story, adding original content to fix issues from Bleach’s final arc. Episode #7 introduces original characters and shows the past battle between Yamamoto and Yhwach, offering new insight and expanding the story. The anime’s adaptation should focus on adding new supplemental content rather than cutting important moments, like Yoruichi’s power reveal and Kenpachi’s Bankai. There are many unanswered questions that the anime could address.

item.title: Bleach s Quincy Have a Surprising Real World Origin Most Fans Don t Realize
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARYQuincy were created as rivals to Soul Reapers, meant to be their opposites in every way - white clothing vs black, long-range weapons vs close-range, etc. Uryu Ishida initially believed himself to be the last Quincy, but the revelation that he wasn’t shook the story, flipping what was known about Quincy. The Quincy arc in Thousand-Year Blood War was almost inevitable given their role as equals and opposites to Soul Reapers, leading to a clash between the two groups.

item.title: Bleach s Real Reason For Ending So Badly Explained
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARYThe ending of Bleach was rushed due to Tite Kubo’s poor mental and physical health, not because of poor sales or pressure from the publisher. Kubo suffered from a partially torn tendon in his left shoulder and requested the manga to end within one or two years due to his deteriorating health. The Bleach: Thousand-Year Blood War anime, with Kubo’s involvement, offers a chance to fix the disappointing ending and provide fans with the conclusion they deserve.

item.title: Bleach s Shocking New Bankai Reveals The Strongest Soul Reapers True Power
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARYSquad Zero’s Bankai is so powerful that it had to be sealed away to avoid accidentally destroying what they’re trying to protect. Senjumaru’s Bankai creates a pocket dimension for each enemy, trapping them in eternal suffering as punishment for invading the Soul King’s Palace. Senjumaru’s Bankai showcases the true power of Squad Zero, proving that they are stronger than the entire 13 Court Guard Squads, including Head Captain Yamamoto.

item.title: Bleach s Spin-Off Burn The Witch Breaks Crunchyroll With New Episode
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARYBurn The Witch 0.8’s release on Crunchyroll caused server congestion, just like other popular anime series in the past. Despite the lack of marketing and lower popularity, Burn The Witch managed to overwhelm Crunchyroll’s servers due to its connection with Bleach and the loyalty of Tite Kubo’s fanbase. Burn The Witch’s success can be attributed to its impressive animation, visuals, and captivating storyline set in the same world as Bleach, but in a mystical London.

item.title: Bleach s Weirdest Anime Arc Saw Soul Reapers Fighting Themselves
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARYThe Reigai Uprising arc is the last filler arc of the original Bleach anime, airing when the show’s popularity was waning. The arc introduces the Reigai, artificial bodies that can use the abilities of the original Soul Reapers, creating dangerous copies of the Captains. The arc provides unique match-ups and reveals how Captains deal with each other’s abilities, offering a valuable insight for fans interested in hypothetical fights. Literature ReviewBleach’s filler arcs have a reputation for low quality, but one arc forced the 13 Court Guard Squads to go up against an unexpected enemy: themselves.

item.title: Bleach Thousand Year Blood War Every Squad Zero Member s Powers Explained
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARY Literature ReviewBleach: Thousand-Year Blood War introduced Squad Zero, the strongest Soul Reapers in all of Soul Society, and here’s a breakdown of their powers. Squad 0 has done a lot to establish themselves as some of the strongest characters in Bleach, especially in the Bleach: Thousand-Year Blood War anime. At the time of writing, many members of Squad 0 still haven’t had their abilities fully explored, even with how much the anime has expanded on them.

item.title: Bleach Thousand-Year Blood War Episode 25 & 26 Release Date & Time
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARYNew episodes of Bleach: Thousand-Year Blood War release on Hulu in the US and Disney Plus in the rest of the world, every Saturday. Episode #24 showcased a solid start to the showdown between Squad Zero and Yhwach’s elites, featuring new material and big cuts. Episodes #25 and #26 will test Yhwach’s strength as Squad Zero battles against his elite soldiers, while Ichigo and his friends prepare to provide backup.

item.title: Bleach Thousand-Year Blood War Finally Redeems One Captain With a Major Power-Up
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARYDespite being defeated by their Quincy adversaries and turned into zombies, the fallen Soul Reaper Captains prove to be more powerful and fierce in battle than when they were alive. Hitsugaya, Kensei, Rose, and Rangiku demonstrate their exceptional combat skills even in their zombified state, with Hitsugaya even using his Zanpakuto and creative ice spike attacks. Although it may be possible for these Soul Reapers to be restored to their proper life, the means to do so remains unknown, leaving them no choice but to continue fighting as zombies for now.

item.title: Bleach Thousand-Year Blood War Just Changed The Series Power Scaling
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARYThe anime adaptation of Bleach: Thousand-Year Blood War in episode #23 showcases the abilities of the Sternritter, revealing that they are more powerful than initially thought. Byakuya Kuchiki’s fight against multiple Sternritter is expanded in the anime, giving fans a better understanding of their abilities and power levels. The addition of dialog and actions during the fight scene changes fans’ perceptions of the characters’ abilities, making them appear stronger than previously believed.

item.title: Bleach Thousand-Year Blood War Part 3 Announced Alongside Release Window
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARY Literature ReviewRight after the dramatic finale of the second season of Bleach: Thousand Year Blood War, part 3 has been announced. Bleach: Thousand Year Blood War is an adaptation of the popular manga Bleach by Tite Kubo. Airing from October 2004 to March 2012, the original anime ended without adapting the final arc of the manga. Fans of the franchise were understandably ecstatic when a new anime arrived to finish the project in 2022.

item.title: Bleach Thousand-Year Blood War Part 3 Looks Breathtaking in New Teaser
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARYBleach: Thousand-Year Blood War part 3 trailer teases epic battles between Soul Reapers and Quincy, leaving fans eagerly anticipating its release. The upcoming season brings back beloved characters like Aizen and introduces new ones, heightening the fight for survival. Despite a packed lineup, Bleach stands out at Jump Festa 2024, proving its ongoing relevance and making it one of the most anticipated anime of 2024. Literature ReviewThe first official trailer for Bleach: Thousand Year Blood part 3 has been revealed during Jump Festa, and it looks amazing.

item.title: Bleach Thousand-Year Blood War Trailer Teases New Battle Scene for Uryu
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARYUryu’s new scene in part 3 of Bleach: Thousand-Year Blood War showcases an anime-original battle against Squad Zero’s Senjumaru Shutara. Since the scene in which Senjumaru used her Bankai against Uryu in part 2 was not in the manga, it was clear that the story would diverge to explain later scenes. Uryu’s new fight scene may offer a chance for him to show off his new Schrift ability, The Antithesis, and give more insight into Senjumaru’s Bankai.

item.title: Bleach Why Ichigo s Bankai Looks Different in Thousand-Year Blood War
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARYIchigo’s Bankai, Tensa Zangetsu, undergoes significant changes due to his encounters with Fullbring powers, reflecting his growth and development as a character. In The Thousand-Year Blood War, Ichigo’s Bankai experiences another big change, with his original Zanpakuto being destroyed and replaced with a new, more intricate design. Fans can anticipate further evolution in Ichigo’s powers and appearance as he confronts Yhwach and the Quincy Empire in Bleach: Thousand-Year Blood War.

item.title: Blue Exorcist Anime s Return Gets Official Release Date
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARY Literature ReviewA new trailer and visual means the next season of the Blue Exorcist anime is on its way. Here’s what fans can expect to see in The Illuminati Saga. Fans have been eagerly anticipating news regarding the future of Blue Exorcist’s anime adaptation for a while especially with the previous reveal of the visual shown below back in December 2022. The new information provides an expected air date for the new season in January 2024 and confirms with its trailer and title what fans can look forward to.

item.title: Blue Exorcist s Return Date Confirmed Alongside Epic New Opening
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARYBlue Exorcist season 3 is scheduled for winter 2023, and the new opening has just been released. The opening song is performed by popular band UVERworld, marking their return to the series, after performing the wildly popular first opening song for the series. While the voice actors largely remain the same, there are some big changes in the production staff, with Studio VOLN taking over animation. Literature ReviewThe release date for Blue Exorcist season 3 has just been confirmed in a promotional video that features the opening song.

item.title: Blue Giant Review The Year s Biggest Surprise is a Visually Stunning Anime Masterpiece
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARYBlue Giant is a visually stunning anime film that pays tribute to aspiring young musicians and showcases their journey in the world of jazz. The film features relatable characters with a strong bond of friendship, and their growth and development form the backbone of the story. With real jazz music and wild visuals, Blue Giant offers an intense and memorable concert-like experience that will appeal to jazz enthusiasts and newcomers to the genre alike.

item.title: Blue Lock Blu-Ray Review A Great Introduction To One Of The Most Successful Series In Recent Times
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARYBlue Lock’s anime became a global hit by airing alongside the FIFA World Cup, making it one of the biggest anime franchises in 2022-2023. The physical release of Blue Lock’s anime includes the first 12 episodes on Blu-ray and DVD, as well as textless versions of the opening and ending and Additional Time shorts. While the anime itself is great, the Blu-ray release lacks special features and exclusive art, making it disappointing for diehard fans and collectors.

item.title: Blue Locks Second Part Never Delivered What It Promised
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARY Literature ReviewSeason one of Blue Lock is almost over, and the subversive soccer anime isn’t giving fans all of the unexpected twists that it has been promising. Such a cutthroat competition also naturally requires competitors who wish to succeed to adopt a mentality that isn’t conducive to maintaining friendships. As the series is inherently a subversion of typical sports anime, viewers have been more inclined to expect Blue Lock to embrace these unusual tropes.

item.title: Bocchi the Rock! Upcoming Film Project Will Feature Two Movies
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARY Literature ReviewBocchi the Rock! release new information regarding its upcoming film project, including a release window and that it will be a double feature. Sure enough, new details about Bocchi the Rock!’s compilation film were given at a livestream celebrating the anime’s first anniversary. Rather than being a single film as previously announced, Bocchi the Rock’s compilation film will now be a duology; the first film will still premiere in spring 2024, and the second film is set to premiere in summer 2024.

item.title: BONES Upcoming Tech Noir Anime Reveals First Full Trailer And Release Date
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARYMetallic Rouge is an upcoming sci-fi anime from Studio BONES, known for iconic series like My Hero Academia and Fullmetal Alchemist: Brotherhood. The series has generated a lot of hype with its action-packed trailer and collaboration between Studio BONES and producer Yutaka Izubuchi. The anime features a strong cast of voice actors and follows two female protagonists on a mission to eliminate hostiles on Mars, promising hard decisions and unexpected twists.

item.title: Bonus That Time I Got Reincarnated as a Slime Episodes Gets New Release on Crunchyroll
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARYCrunchyroll announced that it will stream the OVA side story for That Time I Got Reincarnated as a Slime, titled Visions of Coleus, at the end of October. The OVA serves as an interquel between Season 1 and Season 2, offering a short story that expands on the series but doesn’t reveal major plot elements for the future. While not essential viewing for new fans, Visions of Coleus provides an enjoyable adventure for fans of the series and serves as a teaser for the upcoming Season 3.

item.title: Boruto Filler List - Which Episodes To Skip
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARYBoruto: Naruto Next Generations has a high amount of filler episodes, accounting for 70% of the show, due to the need for the manga author to stay ahead. Despite the excessive filler, the series still remains popular and enjoyed by many fans. While the amount of filler may be off-putting, there are filler arcs worth watching, such as Mitsuki’s Disappearance and the Time Slip arc, which expand on characters and provide entertaining storylines.

item.title: Boruto Finally Getting Rid Of Naruto And Sasuke Is The Best Thing For The Series
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARYThe absence of Naruto and Sasuke in the current Boruto storyline allows the series to focus on the next generation of shinobi and develop their characters. Despite initial reader backlash, the decision to marginalize Naruto and Sasuke in the manga allows for a deeper exploration of the new characters and their abilities. The upcoming battles in Boruto, which will not involve Naruto and Sasuke, showcase the progression of the series and highlight Boruto’s growing role as a protagonist.

item.title: Boruto Finally Teases How Konoha Will Be Destroyed And It s Not Kawaki s Fault
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARY Literature ReviewWhile the destruction of Konoha seemed an inescapable result of the battle between Boruto and Kawaki, its fall will be due to a more sinister reason. In Boruto: Two Blue Vortex chapter #2, Boruto has returned to Konoha Village after three years to defend it against an attack by Code and his army of beast soldiers known as Claw Grime. Code created them in Boruto Chapter #72, by using his Claw Mark technique to cut off pieces of the Ten-Tailed Beast that Isshiki Otsutsuki had long ago stashed away in another dimension.

item.title: Boruto Finally Teases Mysteries of Time Skip in New Chapter
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARYBoruto: Two Blue Vortex chapter #5 will go back in time to explain what happened during Boruto’s three-year absence. The chapter will reveal how Sasuke was incapacitated and Boruto’s reaction to the incident. The focus of the chapter might also be on Boruto’s intense training and his shift in fighting style. Literature ReviewThe official website for Naruto teased that the upcoming chapter of Boruto will dive into the time skip and potentially reveal its mysteries.

item.title: Boruto Has Fully Accepted He Is No Longer An Uzumaki
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARYUpon his return to Konoha, Boruto shows a cold and single-minded approach, more resembling an Uchiha like Sasuke rather than an emotional Uzumaki like his father. Boruto’s identity could have been affected by Momoshiki’s influence, Eida’s “Omnipotence” ability, and the long time spent with Sasuke. Boruto doesn’t show emotion in meeting his sister Hiwamari, nor anger in seeing Kawaki, the man who stole his life. Instead, Boruto is only focused on his mission.

item.title: Boruto Hints at a Major Naruto Character Death Most Fans Missed
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARY Literature ReviewThe first two chapters of Boruto: Two Blue Vortex have seen much action but they hint at the death of an important character. Ever since 2017 when Boruto originally released, there have been many rumors about whether or not Sasuke and Naruto died. It’s now been established that Naruto is in fact not dead, but has been sealed away, so the spotlight is now on Sasuke. The rumors do have some merit though.

item.title: Boruto Made Naruto s Ultimate Villains Much Stronger With One Broken Power
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARYThe Otsutsuki clan possesses a broken power of time travel, revealed in the Boruto anime. The Karasuki, a turtle-like creature, enables the Otsutsuki to travel through time if enough chakra energy is available. If not for Sasuke and Boruto’s intervention, Urashiki would have succeeded in changing history by stealing Kurama’s chakra from a younger Naruto. Literature ReviewOn a mission to protect the Hokage, Sasuke and Boruto learn of previously unknown Otsutsuki ability that poses an existential threat to their reality.

item.title: Boruto Officially Surpasses Both One Piece And Jujutsu Kaisen
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARYBoruto: Two Blue Vortex surpasses best-sellers like One Piece and Jujutsu Kaisen on MANGA Plus, finally pushing the series in the right direction. The new storyline showcases a more interesting and determined Boruto, while supporting characters like Sarada are given bigger roles, revitalizing the stagnant story. While MANGA Plus views alone may not be enough, and the other series are currently on hiatus the positive reaction from fans proves that Two Blue Vortex is the makeover Boruto needed.

item.title: Boruto Part 2 Is Already Leaving One Of Its Main Characters Behind
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARY Literature ReviewKawaki became the main villain at the end of Boruto but he seems to have already lost all his relevance in Two Blue Vortex, where he shows no growth. After reality was rewritten at the end of Boruto Part 1 and Kawaki took Boruto’s place in the new world, the opening chapters of Two Blue Vortex examine the consequences of Kawaki’s actions, while letting fans catch up with the main cast after three years.

item.title: Boruto Part 2 Is Finally Keeping The Series Original Promise
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARY Literature ReviewBoruto was originally intended to be a story about the “next generation”, but this is only becoming true now that Two Blue Vortex has begun. In Boruto: Two Blue Vortex chapter #2, Konoha is invaded by Code and his army of Claw Grime soldiers. Naturally, Konoha’s security divisions are tasked with responding to the threat, but what is surprising is that the majority of shinobi stepping onto the battlefield are members of the next generation.

item.title: Boruto s Disrespect For Sarada Is Even Worse In the Anime
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARYThe Boruto manga implied that Sarada’s early problems with the Sharingan were due to her father’s prolonged absence, but the anime fixed that by showing many training sessions with Sasuke. However, this means that the anime portrays Sarada as an ineffective kunoichi, because she can no longer blame her father’s absence for her shortcomings. While the Boruto anime usually fixes some of the manga’s issues with the portrayal of certain characters, this is sadly not the case for Sarada’s issues with the Sharingan.

item.title: Boruto s Jougan Dojutsu Explained Why It Will Be Key In Part 2 Of The Manga
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARYBoruto’s dojutsu, Jougan, is a key mystery of the story and its connection to the Otsutsuki Clan is still unknown. Jougan is a unique eye technique that grants Boruto the ability to see chakra and access other dimensions through Space-Time Ninjutsu. The title of Boruto Part 2, “Two Blue Vortex,” hints at the potential debut of Jougan in the manga and suggests that mastering it will play a crucial role in Boruto’s journey.

item.title: Boruto s Most Disrepected Villain Still Has A Role To Play In Two Blue Vortex
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARYCode proves himself to still be a serious threat in Boruto: Two Blue Vortex by defeating Sasuke and displaying his true power. Despite being ridiculed, Code has the potential to become an Otsutsuki god and poses a significant disruptive force. Code’s abilities have been underestimated, and he is likely to continue playing a major role in Boruto: Two Blue Vortex. Literature ReviewWhile it’s commonly believed that Code is nothing more than a “filler villain”, Boruto: Two Blue Vortex shows he is still a threat to deal with.

item.title: Boruto s New Rasengan Has Already Been Explained (But Only In The Anime)
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARY Literature ReviewThe new Rasengan Uzuhiko seen in Boruto: Two Blue Vortex chapter #2 may have been explained in an important “filler” episode in the Boruto anime. After Code suddenly surprise attacks Konoha, Boruto appears out of nowhere to save Sarada from the villain. Fighting quickly ensues and soon afterward Boruto announces the name of a new attack called Rasengan Uzuhiko at the end of Boruto: Two Blue Vortex chapter #2.

item.title: Boruto s New Rasengan Is Inspired By Another Classic Shonen
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARY Literature ReviewBoruto: Two Blue Vortex chapter #3 has revealed the power of Rasengan Uzuhiko, and it takes clear inspiration from a classic shonen manga. The abilities of Rasengan Uzuhiko have finally been revealed in Boruto: Two Blue Vortex chapter #3, and it appears to be inspired by JoJo’s Bizarre Adventure. It’s unknown if Boruto is explicitly referencing JoJo, but with how uncannily similar Rasengan Uzuhiko is to a specific character’s ability, it’s hard to see it as anything other than deliberate.

item.title: Boruto s New Rasengan Solves Fans Biggest Problem With Naruto
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARYBoruto’s new Rasengan proves he’s ready to kill his villains. Boruto’s ruthless attitude towards villains contrasts with Naruto’s tendency to redeem them, making the story more interesting. Literature ReviewDespite having some of the most evil villains in manga, Naruto always found a way to rehabilitate them. Fortunately, Boruto fixes this issue. While the latest chapter of Boruto provided enough sensational ninja action to remind readers that it is the worthy sequel of the Naruto franchise, it also served to quiet one of the longest-running critiques of the parent series, namely that it was way too soft on the degree of evilness its villains exhibited.

item.title: Boruto s New Technique Could Be The Strongest Rasengan Ever
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARY Literature ReviewWith three years to train Sasuke, Boruto has mastered a new version of the powerful Rasengan jutsu, which could be the strongest ever. Boruto: Two Blue Vortex chapter #2 saw Boruto’s arrival and rescuing Sarada from Code and ended with the two about to face off. After quickly taking care of Code’s soldiers, he confronted Code. After failing to convince Code to back off and call off his plan for world destruction, Boruto builds up chakra and prepares a Rasengan.

item.title: Boruto s New Villains Set Up The Return Of Naruto s Most Controversial One
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARYThe emergence of new powerful villains in Boruto: Two Blue Vortex poses a greater threat than the Ten-Tails Beast, as they possess the ability to absorb chakra and control their hunger. The possibility of Kaguya Otsutsuki’s return is hinted at by the new villains, who possess Rinnegan-shaped eyes and potentially have access to the Six Paths Technique. The Six Paths Technique and other powers granted from the Rinnegan could be used to bring back Kaguya, which opens up another interesting possibility for the future of the series.

item.title: Boruto s Real Teacher During The Time Skip Explains Why He s So Powerful Now
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARYBoruto has become the most powerful shinobi in the land of the Five Hidden Villages, even surpassing Naruto. Boruto’s training under Koji Kashin, a clone of Jiraiya, has greatly improved his abilities, including his newfound connection to toads and his use of Sage Mode. Koji’s influence is also evident in Boruto’s demeanor, as he has become more serious and enigmatic, mirroring Koji himself. Literature ReviewBoruto’s return to Konoha has shown him to be a much-improved shinobi, and this is due to his work under his father’s trainer - well sort of.

item.title: Boruto s Sarada Proves Why She ll Never Be Hokage With One Sentence
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARY Literature ReviewSarada has got much of what it takes to be a Hokage, but her lack of confidence in herself proves she has a long way to go for her dream to come true. The sentence, which came towards the beginning of Boruto: Two Blue Vortex chapter #2, was simple but spoke volumes about Sarada’s leadership potential. Specifically, as Sarada and Boruto faced off against Code and a squad of his Claw Grime army, Boruto orders Sarada to fall back and worry about the citizens rather than continue a confrontation with Code.

item.title: Boruto s Sister s Big Role In The Sequel Was Already Teased In The Anime
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARYHimawari’s immunity to Kawaki’s alternate reality may be due to her strong ties to her true brother Boruto and her still-unexplained secret power, as explored in the anime. However, the reason could also be that Himawari’s relationship with Kawaki is deeper and more complex than expected, as they bond over shared experiences and develop a strong emotional attachment, but this is only shown in the anime. The Boruto anime provides important details and nuance to the characters and their relationships, filling in gaps that the manga cannot always explore.

item.title: Boruto s Time Skip Misses its Big Chance to Redeem One Classic Series Shinobi
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARYThe Boruto time skip missed the opportunity to give Hinata, an underrated female character from Naruto, a bigger role in the story. Hinata is more than just Naruto’s wife and Boruto’s mother, she is the heir to a powerful shinobi clan and became a strong kunoichi through her own efforts. Hinata’s absence from the main storyline is a shame considering her background and connections, and her presence during the time skip could have added depth to the story and allowed her character to reach her full potential.

item.title: Boruto s Timeskip Scar Has An Awesome Explanation That Proves His True Love
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARYBoruto’s scar, obtained while saving Sarada’s life, sets the stage for the much-awaited battle between him and Kawaki, becoming the main focus of the manga. Boruto and Sarada’s actions in this chapter reinforce their bond and create the perfect background for their relationship to develop further. Boruto’s scar not only signifies his character development but also hints at the lengths he’s willing to go to protect Sarada, his possible love interest.

item.title: Boruto Shocks Fans Confirming Sasuke s Fate Is Much Worse Than They Thought
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARYSasuke’s fate takes a shocking turn in Boruto: Two Blue Vortex chapter 4, as he is captured and trapped by Code’s Grimes. The Grimes are dangerous monsters created from the Ten-Tails, capable of incapacitating and manifesting copies of their victims. Boruto now faces his toughest challenge yet, fighting against a clone of Sasuke who possesses all of his mentor’s abilities. Literature ReviewIt has been speculated that Sasuke would be killed off in Boruto, but the newest chapter reveals his actual fate is much worse than that.

item.title: Boruto Two Blue Vortex finally Confirms its True Villains With One Brutal Insult
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARYThe emergence of self-aware Divine Trees explains why Boruto villain Code has been disappointing, confirming that he is just a pawn. Code’s role as a lowly villain isn’t necessarily a bad thing, as it breaks the formula of previous major villains in the Naruto universe. The introduction of the Divine Trees as the true new villains provides an unexpected twist and potential for Code’s redemption. Literature ReviewCode has always been an odd choice for main villain, but now Boruto: Two Blue Vortex chapter #4 has confirmed his status in two brutal ways.

item.title: Boruto Two Blue Vortex Hints At How Naruto Will Die
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARYNaruto’s life is still in grave danger despite being sealed away, as the leader of the Grimes targets him for consumption. Jura, the leader of the new villain group, wishes to kill Naruto and take his chakra, potentially bringing back the series’ biggest villain. Boruto and Kawaki will have to work together to protect their father, setting the series on a path of an exciting battle against the strongest villain yet.

item.title: Boruto Two Blue Vortex Hints at its Next Big Villain, & It s Not Who Fans Thought
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARYBoruto’s quick defeat of Code establishes him as incredibly powerful, with few able to match his strength, so he needs a truly threatening villain. Daemon has shown unprecedented levels of power, with his immense strength, speed, and ability to redirect attacks making him a formidable opponent who surpasses Ishikki and Naruto. Daemon’s recognition and understanding of Boruto’s Uzuhiko technique highlights his power and sets the stage for him to take over as the main antagonist now that Code is no longer a threat.

item.title: Boruto Two Blue Vortex Is Teasing A Conflict Fans Did Not Expect
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARYBoruto’s return to Konoha may spark a dangerous love triangle between him and his only allies, Sarada and Sumire. Sumire’s romantic feelings for Boruto could complicate the relationship between her and Sarada. The love triangle between Boruto, Sarada, and Sumire could have dangerous consequences for Konoha’s future. Literature ReviewWhile no one is more happy to see Boruto return to Konoha than Sarada and Sumire, the two women may both have feelings for the returning hero.

item.title: Boruto Two Blue Vortex Is The Perfect Platform To Retcon Naruto
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARYBoruto expands the Naruto universe and adds depth to its characters, making them more relatable and multidimensional. The series provides valuable context, particularly in shedding light on the Otsutsuki clan and their significance to Earth and humanity. Boruto offers the opportunity to address and improve upon weaknesses in Naruto, such as the underrepresentation of female characters, by showcasing their important roles and actions. Literature ReviewDespite widespread complaints and fan dissatisfaction, Boruto has become an essential piece of the saga that can make Naruto canon better.

item.title: Boruto Two Blue Vortex Level-Ups Its Villains With The Most Dangerous Power
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARY Literature ReviewChapter 2 ups the stakes as Code’s Claw Grimes are revealed to have new abilities. Worse, they may be too much for the villain to handle. As Code’s raid on Konoha continues chapter 2 of Boruto: Two Blue Vortex, it’s been revealed that the Claw Grimes are essentially able to kill with a single bite as they turn their victims into trees. It’s just one sign of the creatures continuing to grow in ability, as they continue to surprise the heroes with their powers.

item.title: Boruto Two Blue Vortex Reveals How Sasuke s Daughter Will Finally Surpass Him
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARYSarada’s time to surpass her father has finally come, as she goes up against a clone of Sasuke who is even stronger than him. The new villains in Boruto: Two Blue Vortex possess the looks and power of their originals, with access to their full arsenal of techniques and the chakra of the Ten-Tails. Despite the daunting task, Sarada has the potential to become the strongest Uchiha and achieve her dream of becoming Hokage, using her logic, wit, and improved fighting capabilities.

item.title: Boruto Two Blue Vortex Reveals Konoha Is Not a Paradise, It s Actually Hell
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARYKonoha, once a sanctuary of democracy and freedom, is now plagued by distrust and surveillance, as revealed in a conversation between Shikamaru, Kawaki, and Sarada. The sensory unit in Konoha has the ability to pinpoint the whereabouts of everyone in the village and has no expectation of privacy, implying a totalitarian system. Konoha’s current state of distrust reflects its history of violence and repression, which threatens the peace and prosperity of the village.

item.title: Boruto Two Blue Vortex s New Villains Are The Franchise s Most Powerful Ever
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARYBoruto: Two Blue Vortex has introduced new villains that are on a whole other level than previous ones. The self-aware Divine Trees, born from the Ten-Tails, could be the most powerful villains in the series so far. These villains have the Rinnegan and access to the infinite chakra of the Ten-Tails. Even the overpowered Boruto fled as soon as they appeared. Literature ReviewBoruto introduced new villains that rival the likes of Akatsuki and Kara, and are bound to be the strongest to ever appear in the series.

item.title: Boruto Two Blue Vortex Teases The Return Of A Fan-Favorite Part 1 Character
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARY Literature ReviewThe latest chapter of Boruto: Two Blue Vortex hints at the return of an important character from Part 1 that fans were eager to see again. Kashin Koji is another creation of the mad scientist Amado, made to take down Jigen. Although it is still not known how Amado got his hands on Jiraiya’s DNA, it was still a great choice to go with Jiraiya as his love for the Konoha village would certainly make him view Jigen as an enemy.

item.title: Boruto Two Blue Vortex Will Reveal The Strength Of A Fan-Favorite Character
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARYMitsuki’s character in Boruto: Naruto Next Generation is gaining more attention and is set to reveal his full power in the next chapter. In chapter 6, Mitsuki is affected by Eida’s Omnipotence and directs his hatred towards Boruto, leading to a confrontation. Mitsuki’s Sage Mode is unique and has never been utilized in battle before, making fans curious about his abilities in that state. Literature ReviewA character who went largely ignored for most of the series finally has the chance to show his full capabilities – and expectations are high.

item.title: Borutos New Technique Proves He Is The Fourth Hokage s True Heir
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARYBoruto has become one of the fastest ninja alive by mastering his grandfather’s signature jutsu, Flying Thunder God, surpassing even his father Naruto. Boruto’s new jutsu arsenal demonstrates the impressive growth as a warrior he experienced during the time skip. The mysterious Koji Kashin, a clone of Jiraiya, may hold the key to how Boruto learned the Flying Thunder God technique, linking him to his grandfather’s legacy and making him the true heir to the Fourth Hokage.

item.title: Breakout Shonen Jump Manga Hints at a Grand Return
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARYRuriDragon, a popular manga series, went on indefinite hiatus after just six chapters due to the author’s poor health. The author recently stated that their health is fine now and hinted at a possible return of RuriDragon in 2024. RuriDragon was praised for its cute art style, interesting premise, and its unique blend of urban fantasy and slice-of-life storytelling. Literature ReviewRuriDragon was a promising new Shonen Jump manga that’s been on hiatus for over a year, but a recent update from the author teases an imminent return.

item.title: Bryan Cranston Wasn t Just an Anime Dub Actor, He Was a Great One, & His 5 Best Roles Prove It
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARYBryan Cranston is an accomplished voice actor in addition to his on-screen roles, having provided English voice-overs for Japanese anime. He has played various characters in anime series and films, including Joseph “Joe” Thax in Eagle Riders , Isamu Alva Dyson in Macross Plus , Eddie Barrows in Armitage III , and Fei Long in Street Fighter II - The Animated Movie . Cranston’s involvement in anime shows and movies has contributed to the popularity and success of these works, and he has played a role in introducing anime to Western audiences.

item.title: Captain Laserhawk Crushing Love Review A Fantastic Expansion to the Acclaimed Series
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARYThe new manga, Captain Laserhawk: A Blood Dragon Remix - Crushing Love, expands on the lore of the Netflix series and reveals dark secrets and new characters. The prequel explores the relationship between Captain Dolph Laserhawk and Alex Taylor, showing how Laserhawk became involved with the villain. The manga provides crucial background details and explores the tragic past of Captain Laserhawk, highlighting the betrayal he experiences and must relive.

item.title: Castlevania Nocturne Officially Renewed For Season 2 Alongside New Teaser
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARYCastlevania: Nocturne season 2 is confirmed alongside a teaser trailer showing storyboards and hinting at a larger focus on Alucard. The new season’s release date is still unknown, but the showrunners express excitement and gratitude for the fan support. While it’s unclear how the new season will adapt the game series, fans can trust that the talented team behind the show will deliver. Literature ReviewCastlevania: Nocturne season 2 gets an official confirmation and teaser trailer from Netflix after the first season’s success with fans and critics.

item.title: Chainsaw Man – The Movie Reze Arc - Chainsaw Man Movie Announced With Gorgeous Trailer
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARY Literature ReviewChainsaw Man’s anime is continuing with a movie, Chainsaw Man – The Movie: Reze Arc, that will adapt the popular Reze arc from the beloved manga. During the second day of Jump Festa, Chainsaw Man was revealed to continue with a movie that will adapt what is probably its goriest and most heartbreaking arc that will see Denji’s life become even crazier. Chainsaw Man’s official X account confirmed the exciting news in a post saying, “Production of the movie “Chainsaw Man Reze” has been decided!

item.title: Chainsaw Man Anime Studio Already Busted a Big Myth About the Series
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARYChainsaw Man was a financially successful anime, according to the CEO of MAPPA Studio. Despite disappointing Blu-ray sales, the series performed exceptionally well when it came to streaming and online popularity. The success of Chainsaw Man proves that Blu-ray sales should have never been taken too much into account, as the series will be receiving a movie sequel in the future. Literature ReviewThere have been rumors about Chainsaw Man’s performance but the CEO of Mappa dismissed all of them.

item.title: Chainsaw Man Director Establishes New Anime Studio
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARYRyu Nakayama, director of Chainsaw Man, has established a new animation production group called Andraft, which is already making moves to become a fully-fledged anime studio. Andraft aims to provide a flexible and creative work environment, enticing new talent and promoting better work-life balance in the industry. While Nakayama’s departure from MAPPA raises questions about the future of Chainsaw Man, it may be a necessary move to prioritize the growth and success of Andraft and the overall health of the industry.

item.title: Chainsaw Man Makima Cosplay Recreates the Manga s Most Devastating Scene
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARYChainsaw Man’s Makima is a beloved character known for her powerful and enigmatic personality. A fan recreated a terrifying moment from the series through a stunning cosplay that shows them in Makima’s black dress and pink halo. Despite her death, Makima’s influence remains strong in the story, and she foreshadows the appearance of more sinister villains. Literature ReviewA fan reimagines the shocking scene and shows why Makima will always be the most unforgettable character from the series.

item.title: Chainsaw Man Proves It s Still Popular With Massive Achievement
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARYChainsaw Man’s opening song “KICK BACK” has surpassed 100 million views on YouTube, making it one of the most popular anime opening songs of all time. The success of the opening song further solidifies Chainsaw Man as one of the most-watched and popular anime series globally. Kenshi Yonezu, the artist behind “KICK BACK,” is a renowned artist in the anime industry and the opening’s quality, visuals, and references to popular American movies contributed to its success.

item.title: Chainsaw Man s Most Breathtaking Moment Has an Incredibly Dark Origin
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARYChainsaw Man uses the image of praying astronauts to evoke the fear of space and darkness, drawing a connection to real-life tragedies like the Apollo 1 incident. The bisected astronauts represent humanity’s lack of control over the unknown darkness of space, emphasizing the theme of fear in the manga. The image of fallen astronauts serves as a warning about the horrors of space and the importance of taking them seriously, aligning with Chainsaw Man’s overall thematic exploration of fear.

item.title: Che Lingo Interview Crunchyroll Teams Up With Acclaimed UK Rapper to Celebrate Fall Anime
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARY Literature ReviewChe Lingo, a UK-based rapper and anime fan, is teaming up with Crunchyroll to release the new song LIFETIME in celebration of the fall anime season. Anyone who is familiar with Jujutsu Kaisen will be familiar with Lingo’s work, as the UK-based artist contributed to the soundtrack for the massive shonen hit’s first season. Now, Che Lingo returns to the world of anime alongside Miku Nakamura for LIFETIME and Crunchyroll’s fall 2023 anime trailer.

item.title: Chinese Anime House BiliBili Sets Out To Revolutionize The Industry
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARYBilibili aims to dominate the anime streaming market and surpass international services like Netflix and Crunchyroll, as well as challenge Japanese producers. In its annual event, Bilibili announced over 65 anime series for the coming year, more than Netflix and Crunchyroll combined. Bilibili’s content creation system, combining user-created content with in-house production, positions it well to become a dominant player in the anime industry. Literature ReviewWith a thriving domestic demand for more of its content, Chinese streaming giant Bilibili turns its sights on the international anime market.

item.title: Chrome Lantern Marvel & DC s Crossover Created a Totally New Kind of Green Lantern
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARYIn the DC/Marvel crossover series JLA/Avengers, Kyle Rayner became DC’s first and only Chrome Lantern, thanks to the Cosmic Cube, making him possibly the strongest Lantern ever. The Cosmic Cube is one of the most powerful artifacts in the Marvel Universe, granting reality manipulation abilities. Kyle Rayner’s Chrome form made him the most powerful Lantern in the DC Universe, surpassing even his White Lantern form. Literature ReviewThe Lanterns are some of the most powerful groups that DC has to offer and they come in almost every color, but there was only one Chrome Lantern.

item.title: Classic Berserk Anime Finally Gets The Prestige Blu-Ray Edition It Deserves
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARYThe Berserk (1997) anime was confirmed to receive a game-changing Blu-ray with enhanced quality and exciting bonus scenes. Fans of older anime will appreciate the improved animation quality and new features of the remastered version. Discotek Media, known for licensing retro anime, is the perfect choice for remastering this legendary series. Literature ReviewThe 1997 version of the Berserk anime is set to receive a complete Blu-ray remastered edition with plenty of additional scenes.

item.title: Classic Fantasy Series is The Unofficial Dungeons & Dragons Anime Fans Need
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARYRecord of Lodoss War is a well-executed fantasy anime series that may feel generic but is worth watching for its sincere commitment to the premise. The franchise has a prolific history in Japan. It started with the transcriptions of RPG sessions, leading to novels, manga adaptations, anime, and even a 2019 sequel manga. The original series is a high fantasy classic, with a strong first episode that pays homage to The Lord of the Rings and an epic war story that unfolds throughout its 13-episode runtime.

item.title: Classic Magical Girl Manga Returns With Special New Arc
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARYCardcaptor Sakura: Clear Card released its last chapter in Nakayoshi magazine on December 1. The manga will receive a “Special Arc” in the magazine’s April 2024 issue, which comes out on March 1. Cardcaptor Sakura: Clear Card has been serialized since 2016 and and is a follow-up series to CLAMP’s other work, Cardcaptor Sakura. IT received an anime adaptation in 2018. Literature ReviewKodansha’s Nakayoshi magazine announced that it will publish a “Special Arc” for Cardcaptor Sakura: Clear Card in its April 2024 issue.

item.title: Classic Netflix Horror Anime is the Darker Demon Slayer Fans Need to Watch
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARY Literature ReviewStreaming breathes new life into a cult classic of supernatural mysteries with the perfect companion series to watch after Demon Slayer. Mononoke shouldn’t be confused with Studio Ghibli classic Princess Mononoke – for context, “mononoke” is a catch-all term for a supernatural being or spirit. The series first aired in Japan in 2007. It was never officially released in North America, but earlier in 2023, it was given a Blu-ray release, including an all-new English dub by Discotek Media and is currently available on Netflix.

item.title: Classic Psychology Anime is The Weirdest Series Most Fans Missed
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARY Literature ReviewDespite its fever-dream visuals and zany protagonist, Welcome to Dr. Irabu’s Office is a sincere and sympathetic look at mental health conditions. It really isn’t hyperbole to say there isn’t anything like Irabu’s, known as Trapeze in Japan. While its psychadelic visuals are a good conversation starter, its true strength is its storytelling, thanks to a surprisingly nuanced look at psychological issues and self-improvement. No other anime to date seems willing to broach the topic, which is what makes this show so special.

item.title: Classroom of the Elite Shares First Teaser Trailer For Anticipated Season 3
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARYAfter a long hiatus, Classroom of the Elite returned with a second season and fans eagerly anticipate the upcoming season 3, set to air in January 2024. The teaser trailer for season 3 reveals a new test in Japanese shrines, adding an intriguing element to the series and teasing a highly anticipated confrontation between Ayanakoji and Arisu Sakayanagi. With continuity in the core cast and staff, Studio Lersche’s proven track record, and a gripping twist on the high school anime plot, Classroom of the Elite is expected to be one of the most beloved series of 2024.

item.title: Cobra Commander s New Origin Brings Back a Controversial 80s Twist on G.I. Joe Lore
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARYCobra Commander #1 brings Cobra-La, a controversial element from G.I. Joe: The Movie, into the Energon Universe. The origins of Cobra Commander in the new continuity reveal that he is a wayward human adopted by the serpent-people of Cobra-La. Cobra Commander’s experiments on Megatron, and desire to find more Energon, lead him to leave Cobra-La in search of the power to create even greater weapons. Literature ReviewCobra Commander #1 reveals the G.

item.title: Code Geass Collector s Edition Box Set Review A Beautiful & Well Made Collection
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARYCode Geass: Collector’s Edition is a comprehensive package that includes Blu-ray releases of both seasons of the original anime, spinoff series, recap movies, and the latest movie. The collection also features memorabilia such as a wooden chess set, a 64GB USB drive, and a silver Geass Symbol necklace, all housed in a visually appealing display box. While the price tag may be steep, the high production quality and attention to detail make it a worthwhile investment for dedicated fans of the franchise.

item.title: Code Is Not Boruto s Worst Villain, He s A Genius Misdirection
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARYCode is considered the most disappointing villain in the Naruto franchise, with a history of failing to live up to expectations. However, Boruto: Two Blue Vortex may still have surprises in store, as creator Masashi Kishimoto has a history of subverting fan expectations. The mistreatment of Code could be a deliberate misdirection, as Kishimoto often flips storylines to surprise readers. Literature ReviewWhile prime Boruto antagonist Code continues to be embarrassed, the creators have fans just where they want them for his ultimate resurgence.

item.title: Controversial Isekai Will Return On Crunchyroll For A Fourth Season
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARYThe Rising of the Shield Hero has been renewed for a fourth season. Based on the light novels, Season 4 will likely cover Naofumi and his friends resolving Raphtalia’s bid for the throne and facing off against the Phoenix. The excellent writing and direction of season 3 leaves a lot to be excited about for season 4. Literature ReviewThe Rising of the Shield Hero has had plenty of success despite its controversial nature, and now the anime is officially receiving a fourth season.

item.title: Cowboy Bebop Faye Valentine Cosplay Stuns With Anime Accurate Look
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARYVinnegal_’s Faye Valentine cosplay perfectly replicates the original anime outfit, down to the smallest details. The design-accurate outfit showcased in the cosplay is more visually appealing for cameras than the Netflix adaptation – even if the costuming made sense for the streaming service’s take on the character. The cosplay serves as an example of how artists can recreate anime appearances, and should inspire future live-action adaptations to pay attention to detail.

item.title: Cowboy Bebop The Movie Officially Returns to Theaters
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARYCowboy Bebop: The Movie will be shown in over 300 theaters in the U.S. for three days only, from January 21 to January 23, as part of Anime Expoìs Cinema Night series. The movie takes place during the timeline of the anime series and focuses on a high-stakes bounty case that the crew of the Bebop must solve. Fans appreciate the movie’s cool vibe and how it enhances the anime experience with better animation, storytelling, and mesmerizing music.

item.title: Cowboy Bebop The Movie Review A Monumental Achievement in Animation With One Catch
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARY Literature ReviewCowboy Bebop: Knockin’ on Heaven’s Door goes unnoticed too often, even though it boasts some of the best action scenes ever put to screen. While it’s easy to disregard the movie as a quick tie-in to bring in a few extra dollars out of the Cowboy Bebop anime, thinking it’s sloppy or uninspired would be a disservice to both. The movie, created by staff from Sunrise, Bones, and Bandai Visual, is bursting with quality visuals.

item.title: Cowboy Superman Gives A New Explanation For His Red Underwear Uniform
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARY“Cowboy Superman” is a refreshing and visually exciting concept that perfectly combines Old West fashion with the iconic Superman costume. Superman #10 serves as a bridge story, providing a stand-alone Old West adventure while also advancing the series arc and leading into the next crisis for the hero and his allies. The concept of Cowboy Superman should be further explored, as it offers a unique and invigorating aesthetic for the character, as shown most vividly in Jamal Campbell’s cover art.

item.title: Creators of Beloved Anime Series Return For New Movie With an Incredible Trailer
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARYAnime studio Cloverworks announces new original movie titled Fureru, reuniting the creative team behind Anohana. The teaser and website offer minimal details, showcasing three characters and a mysterious hedgehog. Fans are hopeful that Fureru will deliver emotional highs like previous works, with Cloverworks’ involvement adding to the anticipation. Literature ReviewAnimated film Fureru dropped its first teaser introducing its visuals, and more importantly, the return of the creative team behind Anohana.

item.title: Creepy New Crunchyroll Thriller is Already One of the Year s Most Unsettling Anime
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARYMigi & Dali is a creepy and unsettling anime that has maintained its eerie atmosphere throughout the series. The mystery behind the twins’ deceitful acts adds to the sense of foreboding and anticipation, even after their true mission is revealed. The unsettling atmosphere is further enhanced by the eerie music and the unexpected victims of Migi and Dali, making it a must-watch for thriller and horror fans. Literature ReviewMigi & Dali is an eerie Crunchyroll anime that shows two unsettling boys manipulating and deceiving their elderly foster parents.

item.title: Critically Acclaimed Anime Franchise Code Geass Returns With Massive New Collection
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARYThe highly popular anime series Code Geass is making a comeback with an all-new collector’s edition box set, including both seasons of the show, movies, and OVAs. Fans can look forward to special features such as commentary tracks, interviews with voice actors, and exclusive collectibles like a Code Geass-themed chess set and pendant necklace. Pre-orders are now available exclusively through Crunchyroll, and the limited run box set is set to be released on December 5th, just in time for Christmas.

item.title: Critically Acclaimed Crime Anime Gets New Season & New Streaming Home
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARYGreat Pretender is getting a new sequel titled Great Pretender razbliuto which will be streaming exclusively on Crunchyroll in 2024. The teaser trailer and promotional image suggest that this sequel will focus on a new cast of characters, with Dorothy taking center stage. The first season of Great Pretender is currently split between Netflix and Crunchyroll, which may be why the second season has a new cast to avoid continuity issues.

item.title: Critically Acclaimed Mech Series Returns With New Sequel Movie
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARYCode Geass, a beloved anime series, is returning for another movie continuing the storyline. The movie will focus on new characters, Rozé and Ashe, and showcase advanced animation technology. The movie features a talented staff, including animators from the original series, and is expected to be a success. Literature ReviewCode Geass will receive yet another film scheduled in 2024 that will follow a different story to that of the original anime.

item.title: Critically Acclaimed Sci-Fi Anime Movie Arrives on Crunchyroll
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARYPsycho-Pass Providence fills in the timeline of the anime franchise, providing important backstory and connecting the gaps between seasons. The movie brings back fan-favorite characters Akane and Shinya, addressing the controversial decision to lock Akane out of season 3 and justifying her temporary disappearance. Providence’s international release on Crunchyroll showcases the enduring popularity and unique appeal of the Psycho-Pass franchise after a decade. Literature ReviewPsycho-Pass Providence, which came out in theaters earlier this year, will be making its way worldwide through Crunchyroll, filling in the timeline.

item.title: Crunchyroll Debuts 2024 s First Must-See Anime With New Romance Series
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARYA Sign of Affection, based on the manga by suu Morishita, is set to be Crunchyroll’s first big series of 2024, showcasing a sweet romance between a deaf college student and a language-loving upperclassman. The anime has the potential to offer a fresh perspective on deaf representation, as Yuki’s world is shared through her eyes, creating a unique storytelling experience. With its well-executed voicework and animation, A Sign of Affection

item.title: Crunchyroll Debuts New Channel For Broadcasting Anime All Day Every Day
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARY Literature ReviewThe streaming service has collaborated with other Sony ventures to launch a 24-hour Channel in order to branch out and find new audiences. The new Crunchyroll channel was already been rolled out on certain TV networks just as it made its press release. Judging by the channels, the 24-hour linear channel will mostly serve as an “economy class” sample, with limited options. The ultimate goal will be to draw in TV-adherent viewers towards trying the online streaming service, with its subscription plan.

item.title: Crunchyroll Mightve Just Debuted Its Most Complicated Isekai Yet
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARYSasaki and Peeps brings together various Isekai tropes to create a layered and nuanced story. The series adds a paranormal twist, with the protagonist joining a secret government organization investigating supernatural phenomena. Sasaki’s use of magic is more powerful than Earth’s psychic powers, adding to the overpowered hero dynamic. Literature ReviewSasaki and Peeps’ 48-minute debut episode contains so many tropes that it isn’t a stretch to say it might be Crunchyroll’s most complex Isekai.

item.title: Crunchyroll Releases Horde of Horror Anime For Free to Celebrate Halloween
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARY Literature ReviewTo celebrate the spookiest time of year, Crunchyroll is releasing a wide assortment of horror anime to stream until the end of October. In a press release, Crunchyroll detailed the exciting bevy of anime being offered from October 1st to the 31st for fans who have a free account. The list of anime free with ads is expansive and includes classics like Hellsing Ultimate and Tokyo Ghoul as well as more recent horror-tinged adventures such as Hell’s Paradise.

item.title: Crunchyroll s Big Harem Romcom Anime To Receive 2nd Season
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARYThe 100 Girlfriends Who Really, Really, Really, Really, Really Love You is getting a second season after a successful first season, and fans are excited. Season 2 will introduce Rentaro’s five new girlfriends, taking the story further and potentially adapting up to volume #6 of the manga. Season 2 is expected to be even better than season 1, with a focus on developing the characters and their interactions, promising great chemistry and an elevated viewing experience.

item.title: Crunchyroll s Brutal Magical School Anime Is A Darker Version Of Harry Potter
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARYReign of the Seven Spellblades puts a brutal spin on the magic school trope, with dangers lurking within its version of Hogwarts called Kimberly Magic Academy. Unlike Hogwarts, Kimberly is essentially entirely off-limits due to its lurking dangers, and its teachers take a hands-off approach, leaving students to face numerous perils on their own. While there are similarities to Harry Potter, Reign of the Seven Spellblades deviates with darker tones, involving torture and a unique samurai culture, appealing to a more mature viewership.

item.title: Crunchyroll s Complicated New Isekai Reverses the Genre s Central Trope
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARYIn Sasaki and Peeps, the roles of the fantasy world and the modern world have been clearly established by episode 3. The main character, Sasaki, uses the fantasy world to make money and enjoy fine dining, but gets drawn into a covert government bureau in his own world. The anime maintains a focus on the modern world and the action that takes place there, while the fantasy world serves as a backdrop for trade and commerce.

item.title: Crunchyroll s Most Motivational Anime Is A Masterpiece More Fans Need To See
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARY Literature ReviewTaking relatable characters on an impossible journey, A Place Further Than The Universe connects with viewers in a way that few other stories can. A Place Father Than the Universe follows a group of four high-school girls who, despite having different reasons for doing so, decide to embark on a journey to Antarctica together. Naturally, such a journey is full of difficulties and hurdles to overcome that start long before their ship departs.

item.title: Crunchyroll s New Anime Is The Mature Fantasy Fans Needed (Despite Its Title)
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARYMy Daughter Left the Nest and Returned an S-Rank Adventurer subverts first impressions and is a mature anime that explores the complexities of a father-daughter relationship. The series masterfully portrays how a new evil affects both an S-ranked adventurer and her father, showing the contrasting dynamics between their lives. The anime highlights the love between a father and daughter, emphasizing that no matter the circumstances, their bond will always connect them.

item.title: Crunchyroll s New Gaming Anime Has a Unique Twist That Makes it a Must Watch
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARYProtocol: Rain stands out from other gaming anime due to its focus on complex relationships over gameplay, featuring a first-person shooter with retro graphics. Explosion-kun’s true identity as a famous actress adds depth to the story and creates multiple layers of intrigue. The e-sports tournament takes a backseat to the character dynamics, with limited gameplay coverage and low-end graphics, making Protocol: Rain a refreshing watch for fans craving complex character development.

item.title: Crunchyroll s New Harem Anime Pushes Boundaries Again With Unexpected Twist
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARYThe latest episode of The 100 Girlfriends Who Really, Really, Really, Really, Really Love You pushes boundaries even further, showcasing its absurd humor and storytelling in an unexpected ending. The addition of an adult character to Rentaro’s harem in episode #10 is both surprising and ridiculous, as harem anime typically stick to the protagonist’s age group. The inclusion of an adult in Rentaro’s harem reveals that the anime has no limits when it comes to the types of girls who will join, paving the way for future episodes to be even more outrageous and over-the-top.

item.title: Crunchyroll s New Hit Romance Anime Puts A Dark Spin On A Popular Romcom
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARY Literature ReviewA new character in 100 Girlfriends Who Really, Really, Really, Really, Really Love You puts a dark twist on the popular Komi Can’t Communicate. Despite what Komi’s had to go through in life, Komi Can’t Communicate has always been a relatively lighthearted series, but The 100 Girlfriends Who Really, Really, Really, Really, Really Love You has a much darker take on its premise. Episode #3 introduced Rentaro’s third girlfriend, Shizuka Yoshimoto, and just like Komi, she’s a cute girl who’s so shy that she can only talk to others through text.

item.title: Crunchyroll s New Ninja Anime Could Be Naruto s True Successor
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARY Literature ReviewCrunchyroll’s new anime Under Ninja explores a long-ignored element of ninja life, and in doing so, shows its potential to be a game-changing anime, Under Ninja, which is adapted from the Kengo Hanazawa manga of the same name, tells the story of the modern-day ninja. In the contemporary world, ninjas are still present, but they are no longer delegated – at least officially – in hidden villages. Instead, they’ve been co-opted by the official government as a secret military force and integrated into the general population.

item.title: Crunchyroll s New Romcom Anime Fixes One Of The Biggest Anime Cliches
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARY Literature ReviewThe 100 Girlfriends Who Really, Really, Really, Really, Really Love You has finally premiered, and it fixes one of the biggest anime clichés. Harems are definitely a major cliché in anime, but The 100 Girlfriends is already doing a lot to fix it through parody. As the title would imply, 100 Girlfriends is also a harem anime, and unlike other anime, the harem aspect, rather than just being an add-on to the story, is what the anime explicitly revolves around.

item.title: Crunchyroll s New Superhero Anime Fixes One Of My Hero Academia s Biggest Problems
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARY Literature ReviewSHY is a brand-new superhero anime airing on Crunchyroll, and it’s already avoiding a big problem with its major contemporary, My Hero Academia. SHY has an interesting premise for a superhero story, and one thing to take away from it is that it fixes one of the biggest problems with My Hero Academia. With SHY and My Hero Academia both revolving around superheroes, there’s naturally a lot of overlap between their ideas and overall themes, even if the execution isn’t necessarily the same.

item.title: Crunchyroll s New Workplace Comedy Captures What Made Zom 100 A Success
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARYMy New Boss is Goofy portrays an adorable and healing workplace dynamic between Momose and his boss, Shirosaki. Shirosaki’s quirky personality and kind gestures help Momose cope with his past traumatic work experiences, which are also the subject of the recent hit Zom 100: Bucket List of the Dead. Unlike Zom 100, this anime presents a heartwarming story without zombies, but still provides a touching and realistic portrayal of personal growth.

item.title: Crunchyroll s Newest Hit Exposes Anime s Flawed Relationship to Videogames
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARY Literature ReviewAs fun as Shangri La Frontier is, its written game mechanics once more are used to inflate the protagonist’s powers, rather than build a world. Rakuro “Sunraku” Hizutome speaks and acts like a gamer; that isn’t in question. However, many of his banal stunts feel too self-congratulatory, making the anime give in to the all too onerous clichés of the overpowered fantasy hero. This is a shame since Shangri La Frontier otherwise has deserved moments of levity, and of course, beautifully drawn action scenes.

item.title: Crunchyroll s Yaoi Romcom Is Perfect For Beginners Of The Genre
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARYSasaki and Miyano is a romcom anime that provides a comprehensive view of the journey of closeted gay individuals. The series explores the inner thoughts and struggles of both Sasaki and Miyano as they come to grips with their feelings. The show uses metaphors and themes, such as food preferences and shared love of yaoi manga, to depict the evolving relationship between the protagonists. Literature ReviewNew yaoi fans should start their journey with Sasaki and Miyano as they set out on their love story together, navigating uncharted waters.

item.title: Crunchyroll Unveils Solo Leveling s Release Date & New Trailer
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARYSolo Leveling, the popular Korean manhwa, is set to debut as an anime series on January 6, 2024, with a global release in over 200 territories. The anime adaptation is a collaboration between A-1 Studios and Crunchyroll, promising high-quality content that resonates with fans. Solo Leveling, known for its iconic action style, follows the story of Sung Jinwoo as he gains the ability to level up and becomes a powerful Hunter.

item.title: Crunchyroll Unveils Winter 2024 Anime Release Calendar
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARYThe winter 2024 season lineup for Crunchyroll looks promising, with a mix of old favorites and new shows featuring a variety of talent. Fantasy and isekai anime continue to be a major focus for Crunchyroll, but there are also other genres like romance and varied stories to look forward to. Prominent new titles to watch out for are Solo Leveling, Metallic Rouge, and Bucchigiri?!, which will be side by side with returning hits, including One Piece, Frieren, and Mashle.

item.title: Crunchyrolls First New Isekai of 2024 Is Ridiculous But Promising
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARYFluffy Paradise focuses on the unique power of its protagonist, Neema, who has unlimited access to adoring animals for her to cuddle. The series appeals to viewers who enjoy cute and adorable characters, with Neema’s cuteness providing a ridiculous appeal to the overall story. The cliffhanger in the debut episode hints at a potentially ingenious twist to the common isekai trope, where Neema’s seemingly humble power might hold more significance and gain her immense status in the new world.

item.title: Cute Crunchyroll Anime Proves How Even Slice of Life Can Tackle Dark Subject Matter
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARY Literature ReviewA Centaur’s Life masterfully tackles major issues such as diversity and inclusivity while also exploring darker issues like discrimination and racism. The majority of A Centaur’s Life, originally called Centaur’s Worries by Kei Murayama, focuses on the everyday life of the eponymous centaur Hime as she learns about the intricacies of living in the real world with the help of her family, classmates, and their families. But as this world’s version of humanity has evolved into distinct groups that include catfolk, goatfolk, angelfolk, draconids, centaurs, merfolk, and Antarcticans, the series has ample opportunity to explore how these groups treat each other and the special accommodations that society provides them to help promote diversity.

item.title: Cyberpunk Edgerunners Creator Gets Manga Serialized On Shonen Jump
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARYNo\Name, a manga by the writer of Cyberpunk: Edgerunners, won the first-ever Gold Award for MANGA Plus Creators, earning a monetary prize and the opportunity to be published by Shueisha. The manga is set in a world where the government chooses people’s names at birth, and follows the investigation of a mother and son’s mysterious disappearance. It has a suspenseful plot and a unique power system. The popularity of No\Name with over 2 million readers, led to its victory in the competition.

item.title: Cyberpunk Edgerunners Lucy Cosplay Makes Anime s Best Hacker Come to Life
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARYA stunning cosplay of Lucy from Cyberpunk: Edgerunners brings the character to life, showcasing her incredible abilities. The anime series Cyberpunk: Edgerunners, produced by Studio Trigger, garnered multiple awards and continues to be popular among fans a year after its release. Despite not being the main character, Lucy steals the spotlight with her charm, impact on other characters, and her personal history with the megacorporation Arasaka. Literature ReviewThe Netflix Original anime, Cyberpunk: Edgerunners, stole the spotlight in 2022 and now, a cosplay of Lucy Kushinada brings the hacker to life!

item.title: Cyborg s New Power Gives the Titans an Edge Even the Justice League Can t Match
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARYVictor is immune to the Star Conqueror spores because he is more machine than man, lacking the essential parts that the spore needs to latch onto and control him. Cyborg’s unique immunity to the spores makes him a valuable asset in the Beast World Crisis. Cyborg’s ability to create Boom Tubes also makes him an exceptionally unique hero. Literature ReviewCyborg is known for having capabilities that other heroes could only dream of, and his latest ability is sure to make some Justice Leaguers jealous.

item.title: Dark Gundam Series is Secretly the Perfect Holiday Anime, Confirms Studio
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARYMobile Suit Gundam 0080: War in the Pocket will be screened in theaters on Christmas Eve, celebrating the 40-year anniversary of distributor Emotion Label. The OVA is set during a space colony’s holiday season, making it a fitting choice for Christmas viewing. War in the Pocket is a fan-favorite side story set in the Universal Century timeline, praised for its bold and dark storytelling. Literature ReviewDespite its horrific, but necessary, depiction of war, Sunrise and Gundam fans still mirthfully consider War in the Pocket perfect for Christmas.

item.title: Dark Power Rangers Anime Gets First Trailer And Release Date
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARY Literature ReviewAfter months of silence about its production and release date, the upcoming Go! Go! Loser Ranger! anime finally gives fans new exciting information. As revealed in a trailer posted to the official Shochiko Anime Studio YouTube channel, the series will debut in 2024. While this means that it can drop in any one of the four - Winter, Spring, Summer, and Fall - traditional anime seasons, just the fact that it will occur within the next year is good news for its fans.

item.title: Dark Robin Hood Re-Imagining NOTTINGHAM Reaches Finale (Exclusive)
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARYRobin Hood is portrayed as a murderer, looking out for himself and King Richard in Nottingham from Mad Cave Studios. The third and final volume of Nottingham will serve as the finale to the series, pitting the Sheriff against Robin as they battle for Nottingham. The creative team, including acclaimed letterer Justin Birch, has put in years of work to complete the series, promising action, twists, and new revelations in the concluding arc.

item.title: Darkseid vs Gog DC s Ultimate Gods of Evil Just Went to War
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARYDC villain Gog wants a glorious end, in order to earn his place in Heaven, and plans to fight Darkseid to achieve it, even if this has disasterous consequences for the rest of the DC Universe. Darkseid is willing to fight Gog because he possesses the Anti-Life Equation, something Darkseid desires. Batman/Superman: World’s Finest #23 finally reaches the long-awaited intense confrontation between Gog and Darkseid, with high stakes for both characters.

item.title: Darth Vader & Grand Admiral Thrawn Unite in First Look at THRAWN ALLIANCES Adaptation
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARYGrand Admiral Thrawn and Darth Vader team up to confront a threat to the Empire in Thrawn: Alliances, which also explores their first encounter during the Clone Wars. The Thrawn: Alliances comic adaptation, written by Timothy Zahn and Jody Houser, provides fans with parallel stories set before the original Star Wars trilogy. The preview reveals the contrasting personalities of Thrawn and Vader, as well as their different approaches to leadership, adding new depth to these iconic Star Wars villains.

item.title: DBZs Worst Villain Became Dragon Ball GTs Greatest Hero
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARY Literature ReviewMajin Buu is the strongest villain in Dragon Ball Z, but when Kid Buu was reincarnated as an established character in Dragon Ball GT he became a hero. Majin Buu is easily the most powerful villain in both the classic and Z eras of the Dragon Ball series.
