Vegeta turns on Goku in chapter #76 of Dragon Ball Super, going off to fight Granloah on his own, but what Vegeta mutters to himself when the Cerealean is about to kill him demonstrates that Beerus led him to believe that he needed to change as a person to effectively wield the Power of Destruction (Hakai).

item.title: Even Dragon Ball Super Fans Missed The Tournament of Power s Epic Sequel
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARYThe Super Space-Time Tournament in Super Dragon Ball Heroes: Ultra God Mission surpasses the Tournament of Power in grandeur and excitement. The tournament features teams from alternate timelines, bringing together a variety of characters, including forgotten ones like Ninja Murasaki and General White. The tournament offers unexpected pairings and long-awaited battles, like Jiren vs. Broly, making it a must-watch for fans regardless of its canonicity. Literature ReviewThe Super Space-Time Tournament features several characters from the main Dragon Ball multiverse including Goku, Jiren, Hit, and even Yamcha.

item.title: Even Wolverine s Adamantium Can t Survive Fantastic Four s New Weapon
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARYThe Fantastic Four’s children accidentally invent a universal solvent that can eat through anything, including Wolverine’s claws. The solvent was created as a school project and ended up being a dangerous weapon that dropped in the Fantastic Four’s lap. Having a weapon that can permanently put down Wolverine is a good thing for the Fantastic Four due to their history with the X-Men and the potential for their relationship to deteriorate again.

item.title: Every Anime Announced at Kadokawa s Massive Light Novel Event
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARY Literature ReviewSneaker Bunko’s 35 year anniversary provided an opportunity to announce a slew of future adaptations, including a few highly-anticipated titles. The anniversary stream showed a variety of isekai fantasy series and high school romantic comedies would be hitting screens in the future. Given the current popularity of both genres, it’s natural to see more of such stories on the horizon. Judging by the released material, fans can expect KonoSuba, Banished From the Heroes’ Party and Alya Sometimes Hides Her Feelings in Russian to arrive first.

item.title: Every Anime Coming to HIDIVE in January 2024
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARYHIDIVE’s January 2024 lineup offers a variety of new and older anime shows for fans to enjoy, including subbed episodes simulcast with Japanese airings and long-awaited English dubs. HIDIVE’s back catalog includes ongoing shows from 2023 and recently ended series, such as The Dangers in My Heart and The Eminence in Shadow, providing options for fans to binge-watch completed series. The most exciting series in HIDIVE’s winter lineup are the new shows they are featuring, including Gushing Over Magical Girls, Chained Soldier, and My Instant Death Ability is Overpowered, which offer a good variety for fans to watch.

item.title: Every Attack on Titan Opening, Ranked
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARYAttack on Titan’s openings are awe-inspiring and reveal the entirety of the series’ message beyond their visuals. They are goosebumps-inducing masterpieces. Each opening captures the intensity and stakes of the series, utilizing heavy orchestra instrumentals, captivating visuals, and catchy lyrics. The rankings of the openings are based on how astonishingly they convey the message of the series, with each opening telling a story that goes beyond the events of a specific season.

item.title: Every Berserk Anime Has One Undeniably Incredible Element They all Share
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARYEvery adaptation of the Berserk manga has featured music by Susumu Hirasawa, giving them a common thread of epic soundtracks. Hirasawa’s unique musical style has been present since the 1997 anime, and his contributions to the soundtracks have been praised for their epic tone. “Forces” is Hirasawa’s most famous song for the Berserk soundtrack, and it perfectly captures the grim determination of the protagonist’s story arc. Literature ReviewEvery Berserk adaptation has been united by one key element that really helps elevate them: epic music composed by Susumu Hirasawa.

item.title: Every Dragon Ball Arc Ranked from Worst to Best
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARYDragon Ball has a wide range of story arcs, and while every fan has different opinions on them, it’s possible to rank them based on factors like story content, character utilization, and entertainment value. As simplistic as Dragon Ball might seem, there’s actually a great variety to its story arcs, from the largely simple comedic stories of Dragon Ball to the bombastic battles and sci-fi leanings of Dragon Ball Z and beyond.

item.title: Every Dragon Ball Super Manga Arc Ranked From Worst to Best
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARYThe Dragon Ball Super manga has covered several story arcs and introduced new characters and power-ups for Goku and his friends. Some story arcs are more well-regarded by fans than others, with factors such as popular characters or impressive fights influencing their reception. Each story arc in the manga has its own unique elements, with highlights including the introduction of the multiverse concept and the return of the popular character of Future Trunks.

item.title: Every Fullmetal Alchemist Opening, Ranked
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARY Literature ReviewFullmetal Alchemist has a lot of incredible openings across its two series, but some stand above the rest as being some of the best anime OPs ever. It can be somewhat difficult to rank these sorts of openings given that some may have great animation but a lackluster song and vice versa. In addition, given this list is considering the openings from both Fullmetal Alchemist and Fullmetal Alchemist: Brotherhood, many may feature extremely different plot elements and characters.

item.title: Every Hayao Miyazaki Movie Ranked, Including The Boy And The Heron
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARYThere are very few living animators who have such a storied and prolific career as Hayao Miyazaki. Miyazaki wrote some Studio Ghibli movies that he did not direct, and these, like the Secret World of Arrietty and From Up on Poppy Hill , are perhaps among his weakest. The Boy and the Heron , Miyazaki’s most recent movie, proves that he is still a great director and writer of characters.

item.title: Every Jujutsu Kaisen Arc Ranked From Worst to Best
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARYJujutsu Kaisen is currently one of Shonen Jump’s most iconic battle manga, alongside My Hero Academia and One Piece. While all Jujutsu Kaisen arcs have their merits, some standout as being a cut above the rest, with the Shibuya Incident being the best arc in the series so far. The manga’s arcs range from fascinating and tragic to forgettable, but even its worst arcs have great moments that contribute to its overall narrative.

item.title: Every Manga That Left Weekly Shonen Jump In 2023
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARYWeekly Shonen Jump ’s strict cancellation policy results in many manga being ended due to low sales or poor reception, leading to a ruthless reputation. Some manga in 2023 ended naturally or because authors chose to discontinue, but the high number of cancelations is worth noting. Several manga, such as High School Family and PPPPPP were canceled due to low rankings, poor execution, lack of originality, or niche appeal.

item.title: Every Member of One Piece s Worst Generation & Where They Are Now
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARY Literature ReviewAlthough conceived on a whim, the Worst Generation in One Piece was full of vibrant personalities and powers. Here’s where they all are now: Many of these rookies have since been involved in several events that permanently altered the world of One Piece and shaped the story as we know it, living up to the notoriety that earned them the moniker. While most entered alliances in order to survive the brutal New World, some continued to move in the shadows, silently pulling strings in the background.

item.title: Every My Hero Academia Arc Ranked From Worst to Best
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARYThe best story arcs in My Hero Academia’s anime can be determined by factors such as major battles, character moments, scenes of growth, and plot twists. Some story arcs, like the U.A. Admissions and School Festival arcs, may lack excitement and high stakes compared to others. The Paranormal Liberation War arc is considered the best arc so far, with intense personal stakes, game-changing quirks, and major plot twists that shape the series.

item.title: Every My Hero Academia Awakened Quirk User
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARYQuirk awakenings in My Hero Academia involve extreme situations and strong emotions, making characters with Awakened Quirks among the strongest. Geten’s ice quirk evolution allowed him to manipulate ice shape and temperature, and freeze the whole water supply of a city. Uraraka’s awakening extended her Quirk’s range, allowing her to float targets without direct contact. Literature ReviewA few My Hero Academia characters have awakened their quirks after facing life-or-death situations, putting them among the strongest in the story.

item.title: Every My Hero Academia Movie In Order (And The Best Way To Watch Them)
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARYMy Hero Academia’s movies have become an important part of the series’ canon, with characters and events from the films appearing in the manga. The movies offer fans exciting moments, awesome fights, and incredible animation that even casual fans will enjoy. While the movies are not all available on one streaming service, they can be easily found on BluRay or rented digitally, making it worth the effort for fans to watch them.

item.title: Every Naruto Movie In Order (And The Best Way To Watch Them)
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARY Literature ReviewNaruto is one of the anime series with the most movie spin-offs, but all 11 movies can be easily found and watched online. With a movie released every year between 2004 and 2015 — with the exception of 2013 — Naruto is one of the anime franchises with the most spin-off movies. Luckily, all 11 entries in Naruto movie franchise are easily available online. Though viewers in the US have an easy time watching most of the franchise’s movies, unfortunately it’s tougher for international fans as rights issues make streaming the movies in every territory a bit more complicated.

item.title: Every One Piece Movie in Order of Release Date
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARY Literature ReviewOne Piece has consistently been releasing movies for over 20 years, and here’s a breakdown of how to watch them in chronological order. There are few anime with as many films as One Piece.. It should be noted that at the time of writing, most of the films on this list have never been released outside of Japan, so there are no legal means of viewing most of them in the West.

item.title: Every One Piece Mystery Is Connected By One Simple Explanation
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARY Literature ReviewThis simple connection may explain every One Piece mystery including Devil Fruits, the Lunarians, and the secrets of the Void Century. The idea of a single unified theory that explains every mystery in One Piece sounds unimaginable and near idealistic, but it’s something that many experts and content creators tried their hands at. Although the manga has finally entered the Final Saga, the ending of One Piece still seems nowhere in sight given the many loose ends left to tie up.

item.title: Every Pokémon Anime League Champion, Ranked
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARYSome champions, like Wallace, prioritize contests over battling and may not showcase their full skill. Iris, Ash’s former companion, became the first traveling companion to reach the rank of champion and proved her worth in battles. Ash Ketchum, the Alola region champion, has proven himself as one of the toughest trainers with numerous feats and victories. Literature ReviewThe Pokémon anime loves to give its champions a chance to shine, but which one shines brightest of all?

item.title: Every Pokémon Movie In Order (And The Best Way To Watch Them)
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARY Literature ReviewThere are many animated Pokémon movies which have been released over the franchise’s 25 year run. Here’s the proper order to watch them. Unfortunately, the majority of these movies aren’t easily available via subscription streaming services, except for the two most recent films. Instead, they’ll have to be rented or purchased digitally if modern fans want to check out the movies. On the other hand, the films are largely available on most big digital media marketplaces, making them fairly easy to find for those who really want to check them out.

item.title: Every Pokémon That Has Actually Died In The Anime
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARYDeath is a heavy theme in the Pokémon franchise, and while it is not frequently addressed, there have been instances where Pokémon die, such as the clones in “Pokémon: The First Movie - Mewtwo Strikes Back.” The death of Latios in “Pokémon Heroes” is one of the first deaths in the anime that is not reversed by the end of the story, highlighting the seriousness of the event. Several episodes in the Pokémon anime explore the theme of death, including the deaths of Lucario, Hunter J’s team, Jan’s Talonflame, Stoutland, Elder the Trevenant, Sorrel’s Luxray, and Harriet’s Snubbull, showing how the series handles the topic and teaches children about loss and mourning.

item.title: Every Reason Why Naruto Did Not Take His Father s Last Name
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARYNaruto’s surname, Uzumaki, is actually his mother’s maiden surname, which raises questions about why he wasn’t given his father’s surname, Namikaze. The series explains that Naruto was given the Uzumaki surname to protect him from his father’s enemies, which however ended up hiding from him the heroic legacy of his father while he was growing up as a rejected orphan. Another reason was that the author wanted to hide the plot twist of Naruto’s true parentage for as long as possible, which also gave him room for flexibility and improvisation if needed.

item.title: Every Scott Pilgrim Takes Off Fight, Ranked
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARYScott Pilgrim Takes Off delivers epic fights, exceeding expectations set by producers and showcasing the franchise’s best action scenes. Julie Powers deserved more participation in fighting, highlighting a missed opportunity for her character’s growth. The battle between Roxie Richter and Ramona Flowers is the highlight of the anime, utilizing animation creatively and providing emotional depth to their past relationship. Literature ReviewScott Pilgrim Takes Off is here, and it has all the fights fans have come to love from the franchise.

item.title: Every Studio Ghibli Movie NOT Directed By Hayao Miyazaki, Ranked From Worst To Best
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARYGoro Miyazaki’s Tales From Earthsea and Earwig And The Witch are considered the worst Studio Ghibli films due to their lack of depth, contrived storytelling, and unlikable characters. Ocean Waves and The Secret World of Arrietty suffer from weak plotlines and underdeveloped characters, despite their visually interesting animation. Whisper of the Hear t and The Tale of the Princess Kaguya are standout films not directed by Hayao Miyazaki, showcasing emotional storytelling, stunning animation, and strong character development.

item.title: Every Type of Isekai Creates a Ridiculously Overpowered Hero in Wild Manga
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARYOversummoned, Overpowered, and Over It! masterfully combines a variety of classic isekai premises that provide a protagonist with over-the-top powers in a subversive way. The manga justifies incorporating a common trope in a more satisfying way than its contemporaries, adding a level of satirical self-awareness to the series. The unique instance of multiple powers is explained by a clever twist that cancels them out, fitting with the accidental summoning premise.

item.title: Exciting New Anime Series Explores the True Dark Potential of a Popular Fantasy Trope
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARY Literature ReviewBerserk of Gluttony on Crunchyroll gives a twisted spin to the beloved “My worthless skill isn’t actually that useless” trope in many anime. In this case, the hero Fate Graphite’s pathetic skill is Gluttony, and he’s ridiculed for the misconception that it can’t ever be useful. As a result, he’s referred to as one of the have-nots - the name for those who have not been blessed with a gifted skill.

item.title: Exciting New HIDIVE Anime Combines Isekai With Death Games & a Possible Twist
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARYThe protagonist, Takatou, may have already possessed powers before being transported to the new fantasy world, which breaks the conventional isekai format. Takatou’s lack of glowing when transported could be explained by him being asleep, suggesting that he received his powers along with everyone else. The series also tackles the unconventional idea of heroes becoming villains in their second isekai experience, a rarity in isekai anime. Literature ReviewThe first episode of HIDIVE’s My Instant Death Ability Is So Overpowered is hinting that its death games isekai could be breaking conventions.

item.title: Fan Favorite Jujutsu Kaisen Hero Already Has the Series Wildest Character Arc
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARYThe Shibuya Incident Arc in Jujutsu Kaisen Season 2 has given overlooked character Kokichi Muta, also known as Mechamaru, a chance to shine. Kokichi was revealed to be a mole who aided the villains in infiltrating Jujutsu High but had no idea that the students would become targets. Despite a tough battle and assumed death, Kokichi is revealed to be alive and holds important information that will make him a key player in the arc.

item.title: Fans of Cyberpunk Need to Watch One 80s Anime Classic
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARYBubblegum Crisis is a stylish 80s sci-fi anime that combines classic genre tropes to create a familiar yet unique series. The series features a female-led cast of powerful and stylish mercenaries known as the Knight Sabers, who fight cyborgs called Boomers in a decaying and dystopian Tokyo. Bubblegum Crisis captures the aesthetic of cyberpunk while offering a more action-oriented and less bleak take on the genre, making it a must-watch for sci-fi fans.

item.title: Final Attack On Titan Trailer Gives Fans a Glimpse Of The Apocalyptic Finale
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARYThe finale of Attack On Titan will be released on November 4 and will feature intense fights and a passionate confrontation. The final episode will have a runtime of one hour and 26 minutes, and the trailer showcases mesmerizing visuals and action sequences that live up to fans’ expectations. The return of Linked Horizon, the band behind the popular songs from Attack On Titan, as the performers of the opening theme song for the finale is generating excitement among fans.

item.title: Final Fantasy 7 Advent Children Makes Its Official Debut in American Theaters
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARYFinal Fantasy 7: Advent Children Complete will have North American theater screenings before the release of FF7: Rebirth. The film, released in 2005, features epic fights and visually striking animation that still holds up today. Fans will have the opportunity to see iconic battles, including an extended fight between Cloud and Sephiroth, on the big screen for the first time. Literature ReviewNorth American Final Fantasy 7 fans can finally watch Advent Children and all of its incredible fights on the big screen, but only for a limited time.

item.title: First of its Kind - One Pieces Anime Remake isnt Just Surprising, its Unprecedented
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARYOne Piece is getting a remake of the East Blue Saga, a first in anime history, to draw in new audiences. Netflix’s success with the live-action adaptation of One Piece has led to this unprecedented remake. The remake could fix pacing issues and attract new fans, but its success is uncertain. More content is on the horizon for One Piece fans. Literature ReviewOne Piece makes history yet again by becoming the first ever anime series in history to receive a reboot while still airing.

item.title: Flash Showcases a Heartbreaking New Twist on His Healing Factor
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARYThe Flash’s healing factor can also heal emotional wounds, allowing him to process intense distress in the middle of a battle. The chaos in “Beast World” is causing destruction and turning people into animal-hybrid creatures. Flash’s ability to alter his perception of time gives him the opportunity to take care of his mental health during intense battles. Literature ReviewThe Flash might be able to heal physical wounds in an instant, but he’s got a way of processing intense emotional trauma in the blink of an eye.

item.title: Flashs Son Has a New Power No Other Speedster Has (& It s Kind of Gross)
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARYFlash’s son, Jai, has a unique and disgusting power that separates him from other speedsters - negative feelings take physical form and he can transport to wherever his father is when scared. Recent changes to the Speed Force have affected the Flash Family, including Jai, who has been struggling with distressing aberrations and new powers. Jai’s power to generate his own conduits makes him the only Flash Family member capable of instant transportation to anywhere in the world, potentially making him a more powerful hero than his father.

item.title: Frieren Beyond Journey s End Dethrones Fullmetal Alchemist As Number 1 Anime
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARYFrieren: Beyond Journey’s End has officially surpassed Fullmetal Alchemist: Brotherhood as the top anime on MyAnimeList, a popular social networking platform for anime. While it’s not the first anime to beat Fullmetal Alchemist, Frieren has maintained its position for over a week, which is rare and indicates its impressive feat. Frieren has gained recognition for its expertly crafted story, direction, and score, making it a hit with both fans and critics as it is considered the best anime of 2023.

item.title: Frieren Beyond Journey s End Episode #1 Release Date & Time
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARY Literature ReviewFrieren: Beyond Journey’s End episode 1 is a two-hour-long premiere that will release on Crunchyroll, introducing viewers to the new anime series. What Time Frieren: Beyond Journey’s End Episode #1 Releases Crunchyroll is simulcasting Frieren’s two-hour Japanese premiere on Friday, September 29. This means it will premiere on Crunchyroll in the U.S. on September 29 at 8 a.m. Pacific Time (PDT), 10 a.m. Central Time (CT), and 11 a.

item.title: Frieren Beyond Journey s End Episode #10 Release Date & Time
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARYIn Frieren: Beyond Journey’s End episode #9, Frieren fights against Aura and her army of headless zombies to protect the city. Fern and Stark confront Lügner and Linie, with Fern overpowering Lügner and Stark finding a way to defeat Linie. It is already revealed that Aura will be defeated by Frieren, as Frieren’s raw power overwhelms Aura’s magic, reversing the effects of Aura’s control. Literature ReviewFrieren: Beyond Journey’s End started the fight against Aura in earnest, and here’s everything to know about when episode #10 will continue it.

item.title: Frieren Beyond Journey s End Episode #11 Release Date & Time
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARYEpisode #11 of Frieren: Beyond Journey’s End could take the story in different directions, either returning to episodic adventures or introducing a broader conflict. The previous episode focused on Frieren’s past and her defeat of the demon Aura, showcasing her power and background. With the demon threat eliminated, Frieren and her party can now continue their journey towards the realm of the dead, potentially encountering more towns and threats along the way.

item.title: Frieren Beyond Journey s End Episode #12 Release Date & Time
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARYFrieren: Beyond Journey’s End episode #12 will introduce new characters in a new location, potentially starting a new arc or remaining episodic. Episode #11 showed the aftermath of Frieren’s battle, the group met the Elf Kraft, and they had to spend winter in a cabin. Episode #12 will showcase the journey to the next town and may involve confronting powerful demons or returning to an episodic format. The unpredictability of the show adds to its charm.

item.title: Frieren Beyond Journey s End Episode #13 Release Date & Time
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARYFrieren and her party are back in civilization after crossing the mountains, ready to help people once more. Frieren needs to get officially certified as a mage, which may lead to amusing adventures. Episode #13 will likely be episodic, allowing the show to go back to its roots and encounter more demon forces in the north. Literature ReviewFrieren: Beyond Journey’s End episode #13 will continue the party’s adventures in the North and likely return to a more episodic style.

item.title: Frieren Beyond Journey s End Episode #14 Release Date & Time
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARYEpisode #14 of Frieren: Beyond Journey’s End will showcase how the new member, Sein, fits into the cast and affects the group dynamics. Sein’s inclusion in the anime has the potential to enhance the series instead of detracting from it, given his interesting traits and background. The upcoming episode will explore Sein’s character and provide opportunities for fun antics and intriguing reactions to Frieren’s villains. Literature ReviewFrieren: Beyond Journey’s End episode #14 will show more of the new party dynamics now that the priest Sein has joined the main cast of the series.

item.title: Frieren Beyond Journey s End Episode #15 Release Date & Time
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARYFrieren: Beyond Journey’s End episode #15 will focus on deeper relationships and character development. The series takes a unique approach by prioritizing quieter character moments over an overarching plot. Fans can expect beautiful animation, great character moments, and an unpredictable storyline in every episode. Literature ReviewFrieren: Beyond Journey’s End Episode #15 will continue the party’s journey north while also exploring their deepening relationships more. Frieren and her friends are growing closer together on their journey through the North, and Frieren: Beyond Journey’s End episode #15 promises to continue that development.

item.title: Frieren Beyond Journey s End Episode #16 Release Date & Time
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARYEpisode #16 of Frieren: Beyond Journey’s End is expected to continue the series’ exploration of its world and characters through enjoyable adventures. The release time for Frieren: Beyond Journey’s End episode #16 is 11 p.m. JST on December 22nd, with Crunchyroll simulcasting it on the same day. The episode may introduce a new ally from a main character’s past, and could delve further into their motivation and backstory. Literature ReviewFrieren: Beyond Journey’s End episode #16 will likely introduce a new character who has deep ties to one of the members of the main cast.

item.title: Frieren Beyond Journey s End Episode #17 Release Date & Time
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARYFrieren: Beyond Journey’s End is going on a short break before episode #17, leaving fans with a major cliffhanger and potential changes to the central party. Episode #16 featured two stories, one about Frieren reuniting with an old dwarf and the other about Sein’s search for his lost friend. In episode #17, Sein will have to make a choice between pursuing his friend or continuing with the adventure, which will have a significant impact on the series’ future.

item.title: Frieren Beyond Journey s End Episode #18 Release Date & Time
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARYFrieren: Beyond Journey’s End returns with a new installment, setting up a new arc in episode #18. The new opening and buildup suggest a departure from the usual episodic format, allowing for deeper exploration of new characters. Episode #17 had significant character development and a month-long blizzard, while episode #18 will focus on the Mage Exam in the new city. Literature ReviewFrieren: Beyond Journey’s End episode #18 will begin a new arc for the series, with Frieren taking a Mage certification exam to continue traveling.

item.title: Frieren Beyond Journey s End Episode #19 Release Date & Time
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARYFrieren: Beyond Journey’s End episode #19 will continue exploring newly introduced characters and serve as a pleasant change of pace. The episode will conclude the first stage of the First Class Mage Exam, potentially leading to exciting fights and establishing tension for the second stage. Viewers can look forward to delving into the characters themselves and potentially witnessing surprising results as the arc unfolds. Literature ReviewFrieren: Beyond Journey’s End episode #19 will finish the first stage of the First Class Mage Exam and show off more of its participants.

item.title: Frieren Beyond Journey s End Episode #20 Release Date & Time
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARYFans eagerly await episode #20 of Frieren: Beyond Journey’s End to see the conclusion of intense fights and the fate of new characters. The episode will air on January 26 at different times depending on the timezone, and a dubbed version will be released later. Episode #20 is expected to end the ongoing fights and could result in the death of multiple new mages, with beautiful animation anticipated. Don’t miss it on January 26!

item.title: Frieren Beyond Journey s End Episode #5 Release Date & Time
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARY Literature ReviewAfter the stunning premiere of its first four episodes, Frieren: Beyond Journey’s End episode #5 will show if the anime can maintain its quality. What Time Frieren: Beyond Journey’s End Episode #5 Releases Frieren: Beyond Journey’s End will be airing in Japan at 11 p.m. Japanese Standard Time (JST) on Friday, October 6. It will be simulcast on Crunchyroll on October 6 at 8 a.m. Pacific Time (PDT), 10 a.

item.title: Frieren Beyond Journey s End Episode #6 Release Date & Time
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARY Literature ReviewAfter introducing Stark in episode #5, Frieren: Beyond Journey’s End is poised to use him to defeat a dragon despite his apparent cowardice. What Time Frieren: Beyond Journey’s End Episode #6 Releases Frieren: Beyond Journey’s End episode #6 will be airing in Japan at 11 p.m. Japanese Standard Time (JST) on Friday, October 13. It will be simulcast on Crunchyroll on October 13 at 8 a.m. Pacific Time (PDT), 10 a.

item.title: Frieren Beyond Journey s End Episode #7 Release Date & Time
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARYFrieren: Beyond Journey’s End episode #7 will be released on October 20, 2023, and is expected to meet the high animation standard set by the previous episode. Episode #6 featured a dragon fight and downtime for the main characters, which provided a contrast between Stark and Frieren’s goals. In episode #7, Frieren’s party will encounter more fighting and high-ranking demons as they travel to the North, but their abilities make them formidable opponents.

item.title: Frieren Beyond Journey s End Episode #8 Release Date & Time
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARYEpisode #8 of Frieren: Beyond Journey’s End will showcase a fight between Frieren and a demon, following the cliffhanger ending of episode #7. The outcome of the battle might cause tension between Frieren and the lord of the town, leading to potential conflicts and further exploration of the demons’ true nature. The introduction of the demons sets the stage for future encounters and will play a significant role in shaping Frieren’s journey throughout the series.

item.title: Frieren Beyond Journey s End Episode #9 Release Date & Time
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARYFrieren: Beyond Journey’s End episode #9 promises rare but superb action scenes, delving into the protagonist’s past and her hatred for the fascinating villains. Episode #9 of Frieren: Beyond Journey’s End will introduce a powerful and important villain that has been hinted at until now. The upcoming episode will feature intense battles between Fern, Stark, and the demon envoys, as well as Frieren’s intense confrontation with the powerful demon Aura the Guillotine.

item.title: Frieren Beyond Journey s End Starts A Revolution For The Fantasy Genre (Review)
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARY Literature ReviewThe new fantasy anime Frieren: Beyond Journey’s End is a beautiful meditation on life, death, and friendship that stuns in a two-hour premiere. The first episode of Frieren opens where many other shows would end. A party of adventurers has defeated the Demon Lord and returned triumphantly to the capital. One of these adventurers is an immortal elf named Frieren who stays aloof from her companions’ ribbing and antics.

item.title: Frieren Every Mage In The First-Class Mage Exam Arc
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARYThe new characters introduced in Frieren: Beyond Journey’s End ’s newest story arc add depth and development to the series, making it crucial that these individuals and their unique magical prowess are understood early on. Frieren and Fern take the first-class mage exam to continue their journey, while building bonds and working with these eccentric new mages in the process. Each mage in the first-class mage exam arc has their own unique abilities and specialties that contribute to the overall narrative, and add an interesting layer of suspense to the arc.

item.title: Frieren s Villains Are The Perfect Solution For One Of Anime s Big Issues
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARY Literature ReviewAnime has developed a problem with always trying to make villains sympathetic, but Frieren: Beyond Journey’s End has a perfect solution for that. Anime, and fiction, in general, have a definite problem with trying to force gray morality, but Frieren: Beyond Journey’s End, manages to fix that brilliantly through its villains. Episode #7 was the proper introduction of the anime’s villains, the demon race, and they’re established as bloodthirsty monsters physically incapable of empathy or understanding any human emotions, meaning that the story never bothers with trying to make them sympathetic while also letting them do one terrible thing after another.

item.title: Frieren, Eminence in Shadow, & Demon Slayer 2023 s Best Fantasy Anime Prove The Dominance Of The Genre
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARYThe ongoing show Shangri-La Frontier captures the pure fun of gaming and fighting bosses with its detailed world-building and impressive animation. Sequels like The Ancient Magus’ Bride Season 2 and Jujutsu Kaisen Season 2 continue to develop the worlds that fans already fell in love with. New releases like Hell’s Paradise and Frieren: Beyond Journey’s End stand out from the crowd thanks to their bold, innovative ideas. Literature ReviewFrom sequels that exceed the expectations set by their predecessors to new stories that took the world by storm, 2023 was a great year for fantasy.

item.title: Frieza Can Kill Beerus - Dragon Ball Super s Next Arc Has a Big Opportunity It Shouldn t Pass
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARYBlack Frieza’s power and wits could be enough to kill Beerus and disrupt the balance of the Dragon Ball universe. Frieza is willing to use any means necessary to achieve his goals, including destroying the Supreme Kai, Beerus’ secret weakness. Frieza’s ultimate plan with his newfound power is unclear, but it could involve becoming the new God of Destruction or starting a multiversal civil war. Literature ReviewAfter unlocking Black Frieza, the beloved Dragon Ball villain can shake up the Dragon Ball Super story by ending the God of Destruction Beerus.

item.title: Fullmetal Alchemist Olivier Cosplay is the Definition of Badass
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARYValendraVenus recreates Oliver Mira Armstrong’s iconic pose in a breathtaking cosplay that will excite fans of Fullmetal Alchemist. Olivier, known for her ruthless persona and strong personality, is one of the most intriguing characters in the anime. Fullmetal Alchemist: Brotherhood, the more faithful adaptation, remains one of the highest-rated anime series and continues to live on in fans’ hearts through cosplay. Literature ReviewA fan perfectly captures the Major General’s regal and commanding presence with their cosplay of the beloved character.

item.title: Future Trunks Finally Avenges Gohan In Badass New Dragon Ball Fanart
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARYFuture Trunks avenges his mentor Gohan in a powerful new Dragon Ball fanart, finally finding peace after years of struggle. Artist Fellipe (@fellipart) showcases incredible attention to detail in his artwork, rivaling official illustrations by Akira Toriyama and Toyotarou. Trunks and Gohan’s hard work pays off, giving closure to their story even if the fanart isn’t canon. Victory was never guaranteed for these iconic Z-Warriors. Literature ReviewDragon Ball’s future has Trunks fighting for his life against the evil Androids 17 and 18, with new fanart showing Trunks triumphant in his revenge.

item.title: Gargoyles Kickstarter Fully Funded in 1 Day, As Lost Series Gets a Remaster
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARYFans of the cult classic Disney series Gargoyles have successfully funded a Kickstarter project to republish the original comics, which have been out-of-print for over a decade. The Kickstarter project has exceeded its initial goal of $50,000 and currently has over $226,000 in backing, allowing fans to choose from different formats of the graphic novel collections. The second and third volumes of the remastered Gargoyles comics feature writings by Greg Weisman, the show’s creator, offering fans the opportunity to experience his vision for the characters in comic form.

item.title: Gear 5 Luffy vs Kaido in Live Action Is Every One Piece Fan s Dream Come True
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARYThe success of the first season of the One Piece Live Action adaptation has fans hopeful for more seasons in the future. A talented fan created a one-minute live-action version of the iconic final fight between Luffy and Kaido, showcasing impressive videography, sound design, and animation skills. The fan-made video demonstrates the potential for Netflix to create an exceptional version of the epic fight scene from the Wano arc.

item.title: Gearshift Deku s Most Powerful Quirk In My Hero Academia Explained
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARYDeku’s most powerful Quirk in My Hero Academia is Gearshift, which allows him to manipulate the speed and trajectory of objects he touches. Gearshift goes beyond ordinary super-speed Quirks, as it can bend the laws of physics and inertia, allowing Deku to move at supersonic speeds. However, using Gearshift comes with consequences, such as immobilization and a time limit of five minutes, making it a last resort for Deku.

item.title: Genius My Hero Academia Twist Changes the Final Battle Completely
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARYShigaraki steals Deku’s Danger Sense quirk, introducing the possibility of Deku being quirkless for the final battle. Deku’s potential return to being quirkless brings his character full circle and could see him truly become a great hero as teased. The purpose of One For All in My Hero Academia is undecided, and saving Shigaraki may come at a great cost for Deku. Literature ReviewMy Hero Academia just teased that Deku’s final battle may be completely different than fans anticipated with one simple yet unexpected twist.

item.title: Glorious Rivalry Anime Has an Unexpectedly Realistic Twist That Makes It a Must Watch
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARYFirefighter Daigo focuses on the rivalry between Shun and Daigo, similar to iconic anime rivalries, but takes place in the real world with no supernatural abilities. The series explores the relationship between the main characters through flashbacks, with Shun portrayed as the perpetual underdog and Daigo as the superior firefighter. While firefighting facts are covered in detail, the true focus of Firefighter Daigo is on the character interactions and the one-sided rivalry between Shun and Daigo.

item.title: Goblin Slayer s Return Gives Fans What They Wanted Gore & Controversy
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARYGoblin Slayer season 2 picks up where the first season left off, with intense violence and graphic depictions of goblin atrocities. The controversies surrounding the series’ comeback are different from before, sparking debates about the show’s direction and its dark content. While the second season is milder compared to the first, it still contains dark elements that some fans find unique and essential to the story, though not condoned by all.

item.title: Godzilla Fans Need to Check Out Some of His Most Underrated Adaptations on Netflix
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARYThe Netflix anime Godzilla adaptations offer unique and stylish depictions of the iconic monster, making them worth watching for fans of the franchise. The anime trilogy takes a dark and overtly sci-fi approach, featuring a towering 1000-feet-tall Godzilla and a living city as MechaGodzilla. The Singular Point series combines the tone and themes of early Godzilla films with a unique twist, showcasing a smaller yet incomprehensible and otherworldly version of Godzilla.

item.title: Godzilla s New Nickname Finally Makes Him King Kong s Ideal Rival
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARYGodzilla invades Metropolis to protect the Earth from Superman, showcasing his connection to the planet and his role as a defender of the natural order. Godzilla’s new nickname, “the Metropolis Monster,” perfectly captures his mission to kill Superman and highlights his status as a serious threat to the superhero. By giving Godzilla the moniker “the Metropolis Monster,” the monster movie’s title gains alliteration, creating a more cohesive and snappy feel for the iconic rivalry between Godzilla and King Kong.

item.title: Gogeta Vs Vegito Death Battle Already Settled the Strongest Super Saiyan Debate For Good
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARYVegito is stronger than Gogeta due to the method of fusion used, as the Potara fusion does not require one person to lower their power level like the Fusion Dance does. Death Battle! used every appearance of the two characters across different media to settle the debate, ensuring their analysis was comprehensive and considering canon and non-canon sources. While Death Battle! concludes that Vegito is stronger, Gogeta fans may still disagree and find counterarguments, such as Whis’ claim that Gogeta is stronger than Beerus.

item.title: Gohan s Best Dragon Ball Look Gets a Super Saiyan Powerup in Sick New Art
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARYGohan’s Supreme Kai clothing from the Majin Buu Saga is considered one of his best looks in the anime and manga Dragon Ball. Fan artist @DBSKAKERU1 creates impressive Dragon Ball fanart that rivals professional illustrations, showcasing their talent and skill. The fanart image depicts Gohan wearing his Supreme Kai clothing while powering up to the Super Saiyan level, creating a unique and badass design that fans can appreciate. Literature ReviewGohan has a lot of different looks in Dragon Ball lore, with the unique Kai costume he gets from Kibito getting a Super Saiyan upgrade in new fanart!

item.title: Gohans Strongest Form Finally Makes Its Dragon Ball Super Debut
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARYGohan Beast, a new form of Gohan’s ultimate power, makes its manga debut in Dragon Ball Super chapter #99, allowing him to match the strength of Cell Max. Gohan Beast is an evolution of Gohan’s “Potential Unleashed” form, with white hair and crackling lightning in his aura. He easily withstands Cell Max’s attack and turns the tables. Gohan Beast’s impressive debut removes uncertainty about the outcome of the battle, and fans can expect to see more of this powerful transformation in the next chapter and potentially in future storylines.

item.title: Gojo s Fate In Jujutsu Kaisen Proves Why The Series Is A Masterpiece
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARYThe death of Satoru Gojo in Jujutsu Kaisen was unexpected and caught fans off guard, showcasing the deliberate creative choice by the author. Ryomen Sukuna’s comeback in chapter 236 was shocking and defied expectations, highlighting Gege Akutami’s masterful writing technique. Gojo’s sudden death proves that Jujutsu Kaisen is a masterpiece, with the execution of his death being foreshadowed years ago. Literature ReviewThe portrayal of Gojo’s death proves that Jujutsu Kaisen’s non-standard way of storytelling is exactly what makes it one of the best manga available.

item.title: Gojo s Inspiration In Jujutsu Kaisen Could Explain His Return
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARYGojo’s hand seal in Jujutsu Kaisen’s Domain Expansion resembles the mudra of the Buddhist goddess Marici, suggesting a parallel between the two figures. Gojo’s use of only one hand for his seal signifies that he has not yet reached his full potential and is still held back in some way. Gojo’s death serves as a necessary turning point in his character arc, leading to his eventual return in an enlightened

item.title: Gojo s Limitless Technique in Jujutsu Kaisen Explained
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARYGojo’s access to the Limitless technique, alongside his Six Eyes ability, makes him the strongest sorcerer in Jujutsu Kaisen. The Limitless technique allows Gojo to distort and manipulate space, providing him with a powerful advantage in fights against cursed spirits. Gojo’s use of Blue and Red cursed techniques gives him ranged attacks and the ability to generate intense gravitational force and repulsion, respectively. His Hollow Purple attack is his strongest regular technique.

item.title: Goku Actually Stole Yamchas Greatest Dragon Ball Technique
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARY Literature ReviewEven though Goku is one of the greatest warriors in the Dragon Ball universe and Yamcha, well, isn’t, Goku still stole one of Yamcha’s techniques. Yamcha is perhaps the most disappointing character in the entire Dragon Ball universe–and the fact that this wasn’t always the case makes him even more frustrating. While Yamcha has since become a laughingstock among the other Z-Fighters (with his exclusion from Dragon Ball Super’s Tournament of Power being the perfect example of this), Yamcha used to be a pretty badass fighter.

item.title: Goku Can Already Give Ultra Instinct a Massive Power-Up With One Classic Technique
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARYGoku’s Ultra Instinct form can be made even stronger by using the Kaio-ken technique. Goku has previously used the Kaio-ken to boost his god-like powers during the Dragon Ball Super anime. Combining Ultra Instinct with the Kaio-ken would likely make Goku the strongest fighter in the Dragon Ball franchise. Literature ReviewGoku’s newest Ultra Instinct form is incredibly powerful, but one trick used in Dragon Ball Super could make it multiple times stronger.

item.title: Goku Made Raditzs Grand DBZ Entrance Lame in Dragon Ball
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARYRaditz’s entry in Dragon Ball Z was thrilling, but looking back at the series shows that one of Goku’s earlier encounters in Dragon Ball was even more impressive. Goku didn’t catch the bullets like Raditz did; instead he took direct hits to his body, showing his endurance and resilience. Many fans in the US who watched Dragon Ball Z first weren’t aware of Goku’s encounter in Dragon Ball, which may have led them to be awed by Raditz’s debut.

item.title: Goku Never Should Have Won Against Frieza, & Dragon Ball Super Proves It
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARY Literature ReviewGoku’s victory over Frieza is one of the most iconic moments in Dragon Ball history, but Dragon Ball Super proved that it never should have happened. Goku defeated Frieza during the climactic battle of Dragon Ball Z’s Frieza Saga, one which began after Frieza decided to hunt down the Dragon Balls of Planet Namek in order to use their magic to become immortal. During his quest, Frieza laid waste to Namek, destroying everything and everyone who stood in his way.

item.title: Goku Only Survived Dragon Ball GT Because of His Weirdest Skill
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARYGoku’s ability to suck his tears back into his eyes saved his life in Dragon Ball GT when he was trapped in another dimension and forced to play a life-sized board game. He had to follow obscure rules and crying was not allowed, but Sugoro, his opponent, summoned onions to make Goku tear up and break the rule. However, Goku used his weird power to suck his tears back into his eyes, allowing him to continue in the game and ultimately escape the pocket dimension.

item.title: Goku s Best Training Scene Was in Dragon Ball, Not DBZ or Super
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARY Literature ReviewThe circumstances surrounding Dragon Ball chapters 87 to 90 single-handedly one-up every training arc in Dragon Ball Super and Dragon Ball Z. Upon realizing that he left one of the Dragon Balls that the Red Ribbon Army hired him to obtain from Goku, Taopaipai decides he’ll retrieve it after getting a new outfit tailored for him, since Goku seemingly wasn’t going anywhere. Meanwhile, Goku takes advantage of Taopaipai’s absence by trying to drink Korin’s Holy Water to get stronger, but discovers that the Holy Water isn’t special.

item.title: Goku s Newest Ultra Instinct Is His Strongest Dragon Ball Form Ever
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARYGoku debuts a new version of Ultra Instinct, powered by his emotions, which makes him stronger than ever. This new form erases the weakness of being influenced by Goku’s emotions and allows him to reach unprecedented levels of power. The true nature and extent of Ultra Instinct’s power have yet to be explored, but Goku is likely to continue discovering new forms with the involvement of powerful beings like Whis or Frieza.

item.title: Goku s Ultra Instinct isn t Just Powerful... It s Basically Super Saiyan 5
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARYSuper Saiyan 5, a fan-made concept, has similarities to Ultra Instinct in Dragon Ball Super, giving fans a version of what they imagined Super Saiyan 5 would be. Ultra Instinct gives Goku a power surpassing even gods, similar to the power imagined for Super Saiyan 5, and aesthetically, both forms change the Saiyan’s hair to a white/silver color. The idea of Super Saiyan 5 was teased in Dragon Ball GT, but the differences between Super Saiyan 5 and Ultra Instinct are enough to make the comparison debatable among fans.

item.title: Goku Steals Trunks Frieza-Killing Attack In DBZ Sequel
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARYIn an episode of Dragon Ball GT, Goku uses the same sword attack that Trunks used to kill Frieza. The similarities between their attacks highlight how like-minded Goku and Trunks are. GT’s Trunks and Goku had the same murderous idea independently, as neither influenced the other. Literature ReviewIn Dragon Ball Z, Trunks displayed a brutal attack that went down in history as his all-time deadliest, and Goku totally stole that attack in GT.

item.title: Goodbye Justice League Wonder Woman s New Team Is the One She s Always Needed
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARYWonder Woman forms a new team of Wonder Girls to help her in her battle against a world turned against her. The Wonder Girls challenge Wonder Woman to earn the right to fight alongside her, but she initially rejects their offers of help. Despite losing separate competitions, the Wonder Girls refuse to abandon Wonder Woman and show up at her apartment ready to fight. Literature ReviewBirds of Prey, who? Wonder Woman just formed DC’s greatest all-female superhero team yet, officially saying goodbye to her lone-wolf status.

item.title: Gorgeous Dark Fantasy Anime By Attack on Titan Studio is Criminally Underrated
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARYWIT Studio’s adaptation of The Girl from the Other Side unfortunately lacks recognition compared to the studio’s bigger hits, like Attack on Titan. The unique sketchbook-like animation style adds to the dreamlike atmosphere of the medieval countryside setting. The OVA showcases the touching yet tragic tale of Teacher’s endeavor to protect the innocent Shiva, leaving viewers with a beautifully poignant ending. Literature ReviewFrom WIT Studios, The Girl from the Other Side, a 70-minute OVA with just three episodes deserves a full-length first season.

item.title: Green Lantern Unleashes His Ring s Ultimate Power - Creating Life
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARYJohn Stewart’s ability to create sentient life sets him apart as the most powerful Green Lantern ever. John makes a construct of his deceased sister to stand as a guardian over his ailing mother. The creation of a sentient and independent construct introduces unknown and potentially dire consequences. Literature ReviewJohn Stewart is one of the most powerful Green Lanterns in the multiverse. However, his latest feat just put him on the same level as a god.

item.title: Gritty New Mech Anime Sees The Return of The Genre s Best Artist
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARY Literature ReviewCygames and Masami Obari are teaming up for a new mecha, Bang Brave Bang Bravern, which marks the return of one of the genre’s best artists. Cygames Pictures doesn’t frequently produce anime on its own, and Obari hasn’t directed a full-length anime in a while, so it’s surprising - but welcome - to see them team up for a mecha show. More surprising is that, despite its outlandish title, the trailer shows a grounded military thriller.

item.title: Gundam Build Metaverse Review A 10 Year Anniversary Celebration Wasted on a 3 Episode Commercial
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARYGundam Build Metaverse fails to live up to its potential as a 10-year anniversary celebration, offering forgettable characters, scripts, and battles. The focus on fan service and familiar faces sacrifices originality and any meaningful exploration of the Gundam universe. Instead of capturing the magic of the original Gundam Build Fighters, the series becomes a promotional tool for plastic models, leaving fans disappointed and longing for a “real” mecha show.

item.title: Gundam Returns To Its Roots In New Netflix Production
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARYMobile Suit Gundam and Netflix Anime are collaborating on an all-new series titled Mobile Suit Gundam: Requiem for Vengeance, marking their first big-production anime collaboration. The new series will take place during the One Year War, the first conflict that brought about the creation and deployment of mobile suit gundam technology. The series will be rendered with Unreal Engine 5, one of the most advanced computer graphics software, and if successful, could lead to further collaborations between Netflix and Gundam.

item.title: Gundam s First Anime Remains One of the Series Best, Decades Later
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARYThe original Mobile Suit Gundam anime continues to have a lasting impact on the franchise and anime in general, setting the conceptual and thematic precedent for later entries. Gundam has become a common term for any mech seen in anime, but within the series, “Gundam” refers to a specific Mobile Suit with special technology or construction. The original Gundam series, with its dark tone and exploration of the emotional toll of war on young pilots, remains one of the best entries in the franchise and is still worth watching.

item.title: Gundam The Witch From Mercury Finally Answers THAT Question About Its Leads
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARYSuletta and Miorine’s relationship in Mobile Suit Gundam: The Witch of Mercury was a refreshing and praised portrayal of a same-sex couple in mainstream anime. The Blu-ray edition of the series confirms that Suletta and Miorine end up getting married and living happily ever after. Bandai Namco initially tried to downplay the relationship, but the director’s confirmation puts to rest fans’ concerns and solidifies the positive portrayal of Suletta and Miorine’s romance.

item.title: Heartwarming Pokémon Easter Egg Pays Tribute to Pikachu s Actress in the Best Way
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARYPikachu’s voice actress, Ikue Ohtani, was honored in a Pokémon XY episode with a cameo appearance as a character who resembles her and dubs over Pikachu’s footage. In the Japanese version of the episode, the character voiced by Ohtani speaks in Japanese, further connecting her to Pikachu’s voice. This connection is not present in the English dub. Ohtani is one of the few main cast Pokémon voice actors from the original series to transfer over to Pokémon Horizons, where she now voices Captain Pikachu.

item.title: HIDIVE s New Season Highlights Its Huge Advantage Over The Anime Streaming Competition
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARY Literature ReviewOne of the first new series from HIDIVE’s winter lineup already proves a huge advantage the anime streaming service has over its competition. Of course, this isn’t to say that other streaming services don’t offer more risque anime content. For example, Crunchyroll’s Domestic Girlfriend flirts with an inappropriate premise. But none of these and many others fail to come even remotely close to Chained Soldier. The new series from studio Seven Arcs features a unique depiction of slavery and also focuses on a forced and loveless adult relationship.

item.title: HIDIVE s Other Big Idol Anime Series Captures the Genre s Spirit Better than Oshi no Ko
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARYPhantom of the Idol deserves more recognition than Oshi no Ko and excels in its unique twists and gender dynamics. Phantom of the Idol has a focused direction on the idol industry, unlike Oshi no Ko which gets sidetracked by other storylines. The bittersweet and balanced nature of Phantom of the Idol effectively captures the passions and joys of idols, making it a standout compared to Oshi no Ko.

item.title: Highly Anticipated Yuri Anime Suffers Unfortunate Delay
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARYThe highly anticipated Whisper Me a Love Song anime adaptation has been delayed by three months, disappointing fans who were looking forward to its release in January 2024. The delay may be due to technical issues and production problems behind the scenes, including a change in director and a new studio co-producing the series. These changes raise concerns about the visual and technical quality of the anime. Whisper Me a Love Song is a wholesome Yuri story that is very popular among fans of LGBTQ+ manga.

item.title: Highly Influential Shonen Manga Classic is Available in English for the First Time
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARY Literature ReviewDespite its popularity, only now has the seminal boxing manga Hajime no Ippo come Westward with an official release via K Manga Hajime no Ippo is easily one of the most recognizable sports stories to come out of Japan, and has given fans a still ongoing manga over a hundred volumes long, along with an equally lengthy anime adaptation. Despite its influence, it has only now officially come Westward and in English with the K Manga releases.

item.title: Hilarious Isekai Satire is a Must Read For Any Fan of the Genre
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARYEveryone Is From Another World, Except Me!? satirizes the isekai genre and appeals to both veteran fans and newcomers. The series features a high number of isekai’d characters, each representing a different stereotypical isekai protagonist, adding to the comical delivery. The unique twist of the protagonist, Rocco, not leaving his world allows for a fresh perspective on isekai clichés and personalizes his storyline, making it stand out from typical isekai series.

item.title: Hilarious Komi Can t Communicate Art Gives The Series a Darkly Twisted Crossover
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARY Literature ReviewA hilarious piece of fan art by Turbulent_Set8884 gave Komi Can’t Communicate the perfect crossover that makes its cute premise darkly twisted. Artist Turbulent_Set8884 recently shared a piece of fan art on the Komi-San Reddit community page that imagines the end of Komi Can’t Communicate. Komi is addressing her 100 newfound friends with courage in her voice. However, it turns out she’s been harboring a secret. She pulls out her notebook that she’s been using to list each of the friends she’s made with Tadano’s help throughout high school and reveals that the cover is a fake.

item.title: Historic - Golden Globes Nominates Two Anime Films For Best Animated Movie For First Time
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARYAnime’s global popularity is finally being recognized with two nominations for the Golden Globe’s Best Animated Film. Directors Makoto Shinkai and Hayao Miyazaki are receiving their first-ever nominations for the prestigious award. The success of these nominated films highlights the growing acceptance of anime internationally and the continued power of 2-D animation. Literature ReviewAnime has been fairly underrepresensted at the Golden Globes but 2023 marks a change as 2 anime movies were nominated.

item.title: Hit Fantasy Anime is Already in the Run For 2024 s Best Ending With a Genius Twist
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARYFrieren: Beyond Journey’s End has already produced 2024’s best ending theme by cleverly reusing its superb first ending in a new way. The mix of animation styles in Frieren’s new ED, coupled with the beautiful song “Anytime Anywhere,” perfectly complements the show’s themes and maintains its high quality. Frieren’s exceptional ED stands out among other anime, which often have bland or static visuals, making it a strong contender for the best ending of 2024.

item.title: Hit Lovercraftian Manga Finally Returns From its Big Hiatus
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARYGhost Reaper Girl resumes after a year-plus hiatus, with new characters inspired by Lovecraft’s Cthulhu mythos. The new Cthulhu-inspired characters in chapter #36 of Ghost Reaper Girl only loosely resemble their original counterparts, but some previous characters closely resemble Lovecraft’s creations. Ghost Reaper Girl introduces Bastet, an Egyptian goddess, and connects her to the Lovecraftian character Nyarlathotep, adding depth to the story’s mythology. Literature ReviewAfter more than a year of being on hiatus, the Cthulhu-inspired Ghost Reaper Girl has finally resumed with three new Lovecraftian characters.

item.title: Hit New Mystery Anime Confirms its Hero is One of The Medium s Most Interesting Detectives
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARYIn The Apothecary Diaries, Maomao’s methods of solving mysteries reveal her strong empathy and willingness to break rules, giving her more depth than the common detective archetype. The Imperial Chinese setting allows Maomao to alter her findings and hide facts, giving her more agency in her detective work and adding to her characterization. Maomao chooses to dispense her own justice, even if it means hiding the facts from the authorities, out of sympathy for disenfranchised women in her era.

item.title: Hotly Anticipated Delicious in Dungeon Anime Reveals International Release Date
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARYDelicious in Dungeon anime will be released internationally on Netflix on January 4, 2024, simultaneously with the Japanese release. Studio Trigger is handling the production, promising high-quality animation and faithfulness to the manga’s art style. The new trailer reveals the credits song and introduces the voice actors of Kabru’s adventuring party, providing new insights into the secondary cast. Literature ReviewA new trailer for the upcoming Delicious in Dungeon confirms that it will also be appearing on Netflix in January, near the start of the year.

item.title: How Close Pokémon s Ash Actually Got To Catching Them All
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARYAsh only caught 57 unique Pokémon, a mere 7% of the total available. Including evolutions, Ash owned a more respectable 12% of Pokémon. The goal of becoming a Pokémon Master for Ash was about befriending all Pokémon, not catching them all. Literature ReviewWith Ash’s era of the Pokémon anime over and done, just how many Pokémon did Ash have by the end, and was it even remotely close to catching them all?

item.title: How Demon Slayer s Muzan Originally Became The First Demon
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARYMuzan Kibutsuji, the big villain of Demon Slayer, is not only the mastermind behind the heroes’ troubles, but he is also the creator of nearly every demon they encounter. Muzan creates other demons by giving his blood to humans, transforming them and granting incredible powers, but those who can’t handle the mutation die. Muzan’s ultimate goal is to find the Blue Spider Lily, a rare flower that caused his accidental transformation into a demon, in order to regain his ability to tolerate sunlight and eliminate his weakness.

item.title: How Jiraiya Dies In Naruto Shippūden (& Which Episode It Happens)
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARYJiraiya’s death in Naruto: Shippūden was a heartbreaking moment, leaving a lasting impact on the series. Jiraiya was a crucial mentor to Naruto, teaching him important skills and shaping him into a powerful ninja. Despite the possibility of Jiraiya reappearing in Boruto, his death remains a significant turning point in Naruto’s evolution. Literature ReviewJiraiya’s death was one of the saddest in the Naruto franchise. Here’s how he died and which episode of Naruto: Shippūden it happened in.

item.title: How Jujutsu Kaisen s Geto Still Appears in the Anime After 0
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARYGeto is still alive in the Jujutsu Kaisen anime because he is not actually Geto, but an ancient sorcerer named Kenjaku who implants his brain into others’ bodies. Kenjaku is the true antagonist of Jujutsu Kaisen and his goal is to fuse everyone in Japan into a massive cursed spirit. Kenjaku is more powerful than Geto and possesses various abilities, including reversed curse energy, Domain Expansion, and the cursed techniques of his previous hosts.

item.title: How Luffy Got His Scars in One Piece Explained
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARYLuffy’s scars in One Piece are a reflection of his energetic and driven personality, as they were acquired through his intense and sometimes reckless actions. His first scar came from stabbing himself in the face to prove his toughness to Shanks, while his second scar resulted from being burned during the aftermath of Ace’s death. These scars serve as reminders of Luffy’s past mistakes and tragedies, but also highlight his determination to grow stronger and overcome future failures.

item.title: How Madoka Magica Revolutionized Magical Girl Anime
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARY Literature ReviewFor over a decade, Puella Magi Madoka Magica has been one of the foremost series in dark magical girl anime – and there’s a reason for this. The tweet, which included an exciting new teaser trailer, stated that the film – officially titled Puella Magi Madoka Magica the Movie - Walpurgisnacht Rising – would premiere during the Winter 2024 anime season in Japan, with an international release sometime after that.

item.title: How To Watch Dragon Ball Super Super Hero
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARY Literature ReviewDragon Ball Super: Super Hero was a smash hit, and here’s everything fans need to know about how to watch Dragon Ball’s newest movie. In Dragon Ball Super: Super Hero, as Goku and Vegeta train with Broly on Beerus’ planet, Gohan and Piccolo team up to battle a new threat from old villains. The Red Ribbon Army, first appearing as villains in the original Dragon Ball series return as the primary villains in Dragon Ball Super: Super Hero.

item.title: How to Watch Pokémon s Anime Online
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARYStreaming the entire Pokémon anime series is challenging due to rights and licensing issues, with portions available on Netflix, Hulu, Amazon Prime, and Pokémon TV. Netflix is the home for new Pokémon episodes and also offers the original series, recent seasons, a special miniseries, and two movies. Hulu hosts the sixth generation series Pokémon XY and its related parts, but important specials are missing. Amazon Prime has a mix of seasons available for free or purchase, and Pokémon TV offers free streaming with no ads and rotating series.

item.title: Huge Anime Crisis Averted - Thousands of Classic Anime Were Just Saved
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARYTokyo Laboratory’s thousands of anime master shots will be preserved by the newly formed TOHO Archive, relieving fears of their destruction. TOHO Archive will now manage the unclaimed anime masters, ensuring their preservation and preventing their destruction. While questions remain about TOHO’s long-term plans for the media, for now, anime fans can rejoice that the masters will not be erased from history. Literature ReviewTOHO has announced a new archive company that will oversee the thousands of anime masters Tokyo Laboratory left after it shut down.

item.title: Huge BL Anime Movie Canceled
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARYThe highly anticipated anime adaptation of Ten Count has been officially canceled due to a series of production issues. The adaptation was initially planned as a televised series in 2020, but was later changed to an anime film with a theatrical release in 2023 that was never released. The cancelation was confirmed on the official website and X account for the project, which will shut down on March 31, 2024, leaving fans with no hope for the popular series to have its time on the big screen.

item.title: Hulu s Most Underrated Anime Is The Perfect Series For Beginners
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARYSummertime Rendering is an underrated gem on Hulu, perfect for new fans and a great introduction to anime. With a rating of 8.5 on MyAnimeList and praise from Hideo Kojima, this anime is a masterpiece that captures everything good about the medium. The explosive action sequences, gorgeous visuals, and intricate plot make Summertime Rendering a must-watch series that encapsulates everything good about anime. Literature ReviewSummertime Rendering encapsulates everything that makes anime good, and as such it is the perfect introduction to the genre for new fans.

item.title: Hunter x Hunter Author Finally Explains The Most Tearful Scene In The Manga
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARYHunter X Hunter author Yoshihiro Togashi revealed the inspiration behind the iconic final moments of Meruem and Komugi in a recent interview. The scene was inspired by a manga about the Hiroshima bombing, Town of Evening Calm, Country of Cherry Blossoms, and features white speech bubbles on blacked-out backgrounds. Togashi also drew inspiration from other emotional manga moments, such as the conclusion of Ashita no Joe and Raoh’s death in Fist of the North Star, to craft the emotional impact of Meruem’s death.

item.title: Hunter x Hunter Author Just Dismissed A Big Fan Misconception About The Manga
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARYHunter x Hunter’s creator Yoshihiro Togashi increased the amount of dialogue in the manga to provide fans with a more meaningful and detailed story experience, not because of his health. Togashi wanted to convey important information and develop background characters through written words rather than visuals, leading to an increase in dialogue and internal monologs. Togashi emphasizes the importance of writing in character development and storytelling, stating that “words rule” in his creative process.

item.title: Hunter x Hunter s Author Reveals The Ending Of The Series In Case Of His Death
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARYYoshihiro Togashi, the author of Hunter X Hunter, has revealed one possible finale for the series that fans should consider canon only in case of his untimely demise. Togashi has been struggling with his health, resulting in inconsistent release schedules for the manga series. Togashi has also revealed he has three possible endings in mind for the series, and his favorite one is the one fans will dislike the most.

item.title: Hunter x Hunter s Story Would Be Completely Different If The Author Had His Way
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARYHunter x Hunter’s creator Yoshihiro Togashi originally wanted Gon to fail the Hunter Exam and have a time skip of several years before trying again. The idea was rejected by Togashi’s editor, resulting in Gon passing the exam and maintaining some elements of the original story in Killua’s initial failure. Editors play a crucial role in shaping manga, as seen with Togashi’s rejected idea and Naruto’s Chuunin Exam arc, which became successful.

item.title: Iconic Sci-Fi Author Returns With New Fantasy Manga
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARY Literature ReviewA new fantasy manga by Tsutomu Nihei, author of award-winning BLAME! and Knights Of Sidonia will debut for Kodansha. With Shueisha’s Shonen Jump releasing new manga to replace its most popular ones like One Piece and Jujutsu Kaisen, Kodansha has to follow suit if it still wants to retain its the spot as Shueisha’s biggest competitor. The company will start publishing a new fantasy manga, Tower Dungeon, that seems very promising, and it will be written and drawn by none other than Tsutomu Nihei.

item.title: Incredible New Jujutsu Kaisen Art Brings Gojo s Prison Realm to Life With a Surprising Twist
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARYCosplayer and streamer @ChuRuuna created a fan art cake based on the infamous Prison Realm from Jujutsu Kaisen, capturing its unique cube-like shape and worn texture. The artist added a special touch by replacing the cube’s red eyes with Gojo’s blue pupils, giving the impression that he is trapped inside the cake. Kenjaku’s plan to trap Gojo in the Prison Realm required years of work and preparation, but he could have easily lured him with ChuRuuna’s cake due to Gojo’s love for sweets.

item.title: Inhumans Fanart Makes Marvel s Most Unique Superpower Look Real
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARYMedusa’s unique ability to use her long and luxurious hair as a weapon is brilliantly showcased in BossLogic’s fan art. The Inhumans, a society of superhumans with diverse powers, were given a big push by Marvel in the 2010s but their live-action adaptation fell short. BossLogic’s artwork honors the creative brilliance of Jack Kirby and Stan Lee by beautifully highlighting Medusa’s dangerous and cool abilities. Literature ReviewThe Inhumans’ Medusa has one of Marvel’s most unique powers, and now artist BossLogic has brought it to spectacular life.

item.title: Innovative HIDIVE Romance Anime Is Refreshing Thanks To A Subtle Twist
item.author: orangemonkey001@outlook (Ella)
item.description: SUMMARYReal Girl breaks away from typical rom-com conventions by featuring multiple kisses between the main characters, adding emotional weight and depth to their relationship. The importance of the kisses is amplified by the characters’ past interactions and their growth throughout the series. Showing these intimate moments allows for more nuanced storytelling and adds context to the characters’ emotions and conflicts.
